access:
Building is located on quiet street with free street parking. Keys will be available in a lockbox on the front gate so self-check in will be possible. Also, I'll be very available for communication and live very nearby to help with any issues.
Please note for ARRIVAL & DEPARTURE: Check-in and out can be flexible depending on day and if condo is empty the night before.
description:
Great condo in very trendy Logan Square with 2 bedrooms/2 bathrooms & sofa that converts into an additional bed.
Short walk to Fullerton or Armitage buses, just under 20 minutes walk to Blue Line el train station, also 10 minutes to nearest Metra train to downtown.
FANTASTIC bars and restaurants in neighborhood (good options within walking distance), and shopping/sites. Accessible to other parts of the city.
Chicago resident for over 10 years, so happy to provide guidance on this awesome city!

Clean and modern design, with some exotic flair from items picked up from world travels. The space for guests has standard comforts to make stay easier: shelves, hanging rack, desk & chair in guest bedroom with full size bed, and master bedroom includes a hanging rack and dresser space, ensuite master bath, and queen size bed. Both bathrooms include towels and toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hand soap, cotton balls/swabs). Bedrooms have locks for privacy. 
The living room sofa converts into a full-size bed and extra bedding is kept inside the chaise section of the sofa. There is a TV with options for watching movies and shows, and a dvd player and a Redbox dvd kiosk a few blocks away in front of Tony's grocery store. (There is an infrared sauna in the living room that can only be used with permission/release and instruction.)
The kitchen is stocked with standard amenities: stove, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, coffee maker (Ninja with latte options and French press), tea kettle, pots/pans, dishes, and free tea in the white canisters. 
Washer and dryer in unit with laundry detergent provided.
Condo equipped with high speed internet, and although I don't have cable, I have a Roku with access to Netflix, Hulu, Roku channel (and other stations). 
Grocery store within a few blocks, restaurants and bars also within walking distance, and main logan square intersection about 20 minutes walk. Farmers market there every Sunday in season as well as lots of restaurants/bars/shops/movie theater.
Comfortable, clean, cozy space in great neighborhood!

Building is located on quiet street with free street parking. Keys will be available in a lockbox on the front gate so self-check in will be possible. Also, I'll be very available for communication and live very nearby to help with any issues.
Please note for ARRIVAL & DEPARTURE: Check-in and out can be flexible depending on day and if condo is empty the night before.

I am very friendly and social, and happy to provide recommendations and even take you out to some of my favorite spots if I'm available. Feel free to email or text with any concerns during your stay as I also live in Logan Square.

Logan Square is my favorite neighborhood in Chicago. There are so many great restaurants, including the Michelin starred restaurant Longman & Eagle, among other great dining spots, and some of the best bars in the city like Scofflaw, Best Intentions, The Whistler, Lost Lake, Revolution Brewing, etc. There is also a very popular bar a couple blocks away with huge outdoor area with bags called Park & Field that is great during nice weather. There are fun shops from resale to upscale, books stores, comic book store, arcade, movie theater all within walking distance or short drive. There's a hipster vibe but it's a diverse neighborhood. Logan Square named one of the nation's coolest neighborhoods in 2016! It's also next to fantastic and popular neighborhoods of Bucktown/Wicker Park/Humboldt Park with restaurants/shopping/parks, and easily accessible to other parts of the city.

Uber and Lyfts are plentiful, two bus stops are very close (Fullerton is a few blocks, Armitage is within 10 minutes walk), and the el train is an easy walk (15-20 minutes). There is also a Metra station 15 minutes walk north that goes downtown. There is free street parking on my street and on nearby streets, though some streets nearby require permits so check when parking. The 606 walk/bike elevated path is also very close. There are Divvy bike stations (shared bikes) to use all over the neighborhood/city including one a few blocks walk from the condo.

There is easy access to outdoor areas, including a small community park only two houses down on my corner, so please keep smoking to outside the apartment. No smoking inside. Preference is to also leave shoes by the welcome mat and not wear them inside. Please also keep noise to a minimum to be respectful of others in the building. No parties (only guests) inside condo please. Thank you!

description:
Brand new service property. Beautiful single family house in a very convenient and safe Chicago west suburb, Forest Park. This cozy basement bedrm. Common areas including living & dining rm, kitchen, and laundry area. Accommodates business travelers with office amenities ( e.g., Wifi, printer, copier, iron, ...) & washer+dryer. 

Close to public trans & I-290 exprwy. 15 min to downtown via train & 15 min by car (normal traffic). Clse to Loyola Med Ctr, Hines VA & Rush Hsptls.

additional_house_rules:
Welcome to my home. I will do my best to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.  Your visit here will be relaxing and enjoyable by being mindful of the following: 

- My neighbors, please be respectful of their privacy by not hosting  parties, or engaging in any illegal activities anywhere on the premises. 
- My comfy home that I am so happy to share  with you, please no smoking inside the premises. If you break or damage an item, please arrange for its replacement or repair. 

Feel free to bring in food. Please clean up after yourself, especially food scraps.  
 
Washer and Dryer available to guests staying one week or more.

access: In addition to the bedroom and bathroom, guest will have access to kitchen with several amenities: coffee maker, toaster, toaster-oven, crock pot, and Nija food processor, and space in the refrigerator. The dining room space with a large cherry wood table seats 6 people, and living room with cable TV.
description:
My century old home holds distinctive characteristics such as an open concept plan, earth-tone color palette, unique natural light design, a newly remodeled bathroom; and free parking on site.  With easy access to public transportation, either to Northwestern, or to Loyola University, walking distance from Presence St. Francis Hospital. My place offers a quiet place for scholars, PhD  and postdoc students, or those looking for a space to relax.

My century-old home offers some unique characteristics such as an open concept floor plan, earth-tone color palette, large kitchen floor plan with lots of counter space, a newly remodeled bathroom,  and a very welcoming environment.

In addition to the bedroom and bathroom, guest will have access to kitchen with several amenities: coffee maker, toaster, toaster-oven, crock pot, and Nija food processor, and space in the refrigerator. The dining room space with a large cherry wood table seats 6 people, and living room with cable TV.

I enjoy meeting new people, and hosting Airbnb guests and travelers from all over the world. I am also respectful of your privacy, and your need for quiet time. When you need directions of where to go and what to see, I will do my best to accommodate your requests. I am committed to making your stay an enjoyable one. 

I am a teacher by profession, and arrive home by 4:30 pm.  Though I enjoy being home to welcome guests, your schedule may necessitate an earlier arrival. If you plan to come earlier, please let me know and I will send  your passcode with instructions of how to use the keyless entry pad.

Located in the Oakton Historic District, the neighborhood boasts of older homes, multi-dwelling housing, two parks, and an elementary school. The neighbors are friendly, and take great pride with maintaining their homes and yards. Enjoy a walk around the neighborhood, you will meet friendly neighbors, and you'll discover some hidden beauty in architecture, some sustainable initiatives such as perennial gardens with lots of pollinator plants, composting, and a bee-keeper.

There are two parks in close proximity to my front door.  Walk north about a block and you will discover  a basketball court, baseball diamond, and an open field for soccer.  For families with young children, just one block east is an open space with a playscape.

My home is about a 12 minute walk from the South Blvd Purple Line,  (EL) train, and a 20 minute walk from Evanston's Main St. Metra.  Presence St. Francis Hospital is a 7 minute walk from my front door. My residence is a five minute drive south of Northwestern.  My home is located within close proximity to local restaurants, and Main St. Shops.  

If you are driving, you'll have your own place to park your vehicle on the lot in the back of the house.  There are lots of places to shop, and great restaurants within the area.

Throughout my life I've had experience sharing space with others in many different settings. I do understand and respect a person's need for space and privacy. You may have noticed that my unique floor-plan design provides ample space for privacy. However, there is one main space shared in common, that's the bathroom. The bathroom has two entry doors to access the shower, through the master bedroom, and the powder room. Guest using the master bedroom have easy access directly from the bedroom. Other guests enter through the powder room.
house_rules:
Welcome to my home. I will do my best to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.  Your visit here will be relaxing and enjoyable by being mindful of the following: 

- My neighbors, please be respectful of their privacy by not hosting  parties, or engaging in any illegal activities anywhere on the premises. 
- My comfy home that I am so happy to share  with you, please no smoking inside the premises. If you break or damage an item, please arrange for its replacement or repair. 

Feel free to bring in food. Please clean up after yourself, especially food scraps.  
 
Washer and Dryer available to guests staying one week or more.

access:
You will have everything you need in the house from towels to kitchen items, to high-speed internet, a printer, an office space, 2 bedrooms (with lots of privacy for each), 2 bathrooms, jacuzzi tub, Brand New washer & dryer in unit, balcony overlooking the park, new playground for the kids, restaurants, bars, art galleries, public transportation.
We can arrange access at virtually any time of the day or night.
description:
Fantastic condo in a Great Location with covered balcony, gas BBQ and parking! Overlooks Eckert Park. Corner unit.
Parks, restaurants, bars, art galleries, public transportation, library, coffee shops, grocery stores all within walking distance.
Easy access to downtown, the Magnificent Mile, Bucktown, Wicker Park, and West Loop.
2 bedrooms / 2 baths each w/ lots of privacy, 2 parking spaces, fully furnished, fireplace, corner unit with tons of light.
We know you will enjoy our home and our city!

Our home is Fully Furnished & Equipped!!  Just move in your clothes, personal items and Enjoy!  The West Town neighborhood is situated perfectly... near the Loop and right in the vibrant West Town / Wicker Park area.  The 'Hot' area of Chicago right now!!

We travel the world and AirBnB is our go-to site for all accommodations worldwide.  We know what we want in a rental and we've worked hard to make sure you'll have the same great experience when you stay at our Chicago home.

Our 2 Bedroom / 2 Full Bath condo has everything you need!
- Corner unit with tons of light
- Elevator building
- Overlooks huge park with softball fields, basketball courts (indoor & outdoor), brand new playground for kids, shade trees, and facilities building with indoor pool & exercise room
- 4 minute walk to Blue Line ‘EL' (two stops from central Loop station to access all EL lines) and a straight shot to/from O'Hare International airport
- On major bus route – 10 minute ride to Michigan Ave. shopping, Water Tower Place and Oak St. beach
- Two deeded private parking spaces
- Easy street parking for guests
- Easy access to Interstate 90/94 and I-290 for commuters
- Many excellent restaurants, coffee shops, art galleries and bars in the neighborhood within walking distance
- Very safe area and great for families
- Small building (6 units) allows for quiet, friendly environment
- All tenants in building are professionals – doctors, teachers, business managers, etc
- 1800 sq ft with unique layout affording maximum privacy for both bedrooms
- Vaulted 12 foot ceilings
- Easily access many of the Chicago Festivals easily - Lollapalooza, West Fest, Pitchfork, Division St Fest, Old Town Art fest, EDC

2 Bedrooms
- Master bedroom with King bed
- Huge walk-in closet with dual level hanging space and armoire dresser
- 6 drawer dresser
- Chaise lounge in Master bedroom for relaxation and reading
- 40' flat screen TV with HD cable programming in Master
- 2nd bedroom with new Queen Bed, 40" flat screen TV and office desk & chairs (optional), large closet

2 Full Baths
- Master Bath has double sinks, stone shower with bench & separate 2-person Jacuzzi
- Master Bath is also handicapped-equipped with stainless steel supports & accessible sink
- 2nd bath is also full bath with tub/shower combo and adjacent to 2nd bedroom for easy, private access

Living Room
- 50" flat screen in living room with HD cable programming
- Massive sectional couch – ultra comfortable!
- Glass coffee table
- Gas-burning fireplace
- Electronics cabinet
- Room is hard wired for stereo sound
- 6 full size windows on two walls for tons of natural light and great view

Separate Office Space
- Huge black walnut desk
- High-back executive leather chair
- Hutch with bookshelves and cabinets
- Paper shredder
- Filing cabinets
- Brand new printer/fax/copier/scanner
- 802.11n high-speed wireless throughout the home included
- Excellent natural light

Full Kitchen
- GE Profile appliances: fridge, freezer, gas range, dishwasher, microwave
- Lots of cabinet space with beautiful dark wood
- Stone countertops
- Breakfast bar with seating for 2
- Kitchen table with seating for 3+
- All counter top appliances – toaster, mixer, blender, coffee maker
- All plates, bowls, pots, pans, utensils, cutlery, glassware

Large Private Covered Balcony overlooking the park with Weber gas BBQ grill and high-boy table & chairs

2 deeded private parking spaces

50" HD flat screen in Living room

40" HD flat screen in Master bedroom

40" HD flat screen in 2nd bedroom

High-speed internet included

Yoga mat, light-weight & mid-weight dumbbells for in house exercise

Brand New Full size laundry in unit – washer, dryer, mud sink, storage

Lots of closets

Central Air Conditioning and Heat

Integrated home security system with motion detection available for use

Optimal 1800 sq ft floorplan with privacy for both bedrooms and bathrooms

Vaulted 12' Ceilings with crown molding

Hardwood Floors throughout

Private collection of artwork

You will have everything you need in the house from towels to kitchen items, to high-speed internet, a printer, an office space, 2 bedrooms (with lots of privacy for each), 2 bathrooms, jacuzzi tub, Brand New washer & dryer in unit, balcony overlooking the park, new playground for the kids, restaurants, bars, art galleries, public transportation.
We can arrange access at virtually any time of the day or night.

We are available by text, e-mail and phone if you would ever need anything or simply have questions about finding the best burger or a tasty brunch spot.
We have many friends and family in the immediate area to help out if we are not in town.

Our home overlooks the park and is on a quiet, safe and peaceful street.
Just a block or two away, the excitement picks up with restaurants, bars, art galleries, cross-fit gyms, a huge library, shopping, and so much more.  The heart of Chicago and Lake Michicagn are just a few minutes away by bus or subway, and on nice days a walk or bike ride is a great way to explore the city from our home.
The park across the street is massive with softball fields, basketball court, indoor pool & fitness center, and a brand new playground for the kids to enjoy.
We're located in the middle of 5 tremendous neighborhoods with plenty of new spaces and places to explore. You won't be disappointed.  Come enjoy Chicago and make our home your Home Base.

Public transportation is easy to find.  We have a car but never use it when we are in town.  Chicago Public Transportation 'CTA' is the way to travel!
The Chicago Ave bus stops a few steps down the block.
The Milwaukee Ave bus is a 4 minute walk.
The Chicago 'EL' Blue Line is also a 4 minute walk.  You are 2 stops (3 minute ride) from the heart of downtown Chicago at Clark & Lake.
Just a 25 minute 'EL' ride straight to O'Hare International Airport.
Taxis are also easily found on Chicago Ave.  Uber and Lyft are everywhere and come right to your door. 
If you have vehicles, we have reserved private parking spaces for 2 cars.

We love our place and wish we could be there more often.  Work has us traveling non-stop.
Families with infants and children have enjoyed staying at our home as well as those of all ages seeking the excitement of Chicago or working in town for clients or spending time with family.

access: One master bedroom with a king bed, one small bedroom with a full bed. The living room has a futon that can be converted to a sleeping couch. Please note the second bedroom is  an enclosed space so you can find quietness and rest. It does not have a window but has a skylight
description:
My place is close to groceries stores and restaurants in an multi-ethnic and safe neighborhood (Andersonville and Argyle), with bus stop right at the  front door, one block away from the Bryn Mawr L-train station and a Divvy bike station nearby. 
It is 4 blocks from lake Michigan.
Ride to downtown Chicago on the red L train takes about 20 minutes
Private parking is offered with the booking, but please note: THIS PARKING SPOT WILL NOT FIT A MINI-VAN OR A PICK-UP TRUCK

The apartment is on top of a medical office, so you will enjoy a completely quiet place in the evening.

One master bedroom with a king bed, one small bedroom with a full bed. The living room has a futon that can be converted to a sleeping couch. Please note the second bedroom is  an enclosed space so you can find quietness and rest. It does not have a window but has a skylight

I would love to meet you upon check in and give you any information you may have. In case you check -in too late and I am not here to meet you personally, there is a lock-box with the key to the apartment so that you can check yourself in.

Andersonville to the West, on Clark Street has a lot of restaurants. From Broadway to Clark you will walk through a beautiful neighborhood with very nice and typical Chicago houses.
Argyle Street, 5 blocks to the south is the Vietnamese neighborhood with plenty of quite authentic Asian restaurants.
Osco-Jewel supermarket, two blocks to the south has a very nice bakery that makes fresh bread in the morning

The "L" train stop is on Bryn Mawr 1 block to the north. The red line will take you downtown in about 20 minutes

access: Guest enter condo through living room to gain access to entire lower level of private bedroom suites consisting of 2 baths and 3 separate sleeping areas.
description:
Beautiful condo in Chicago’s Bronzeville area 5 minuets to downtown with easy walking access to all public transportation. White Sox’s stadium a hop skip and jump away featuring coffee shops and some of Chicago’s historic locations.

Contemporary  setting designed for adults with enough space to comfortably accommodate up to 6. This space features 3 separate sleeping areas ,master bath and kitchenette for preparation of small meals. Ideal lodging for those looking for a fantastic space to rest ones head each night while visiting Chicago.

Guest enter condo through living room to gain access to entire lower level of private bedroom suites consisting of 2 baths and 3 separate sleeping areas.

Host will check in all guests and is onsite 24/7 to assist guests needs with minimal interaction and only upon request.

The condo is in Chicago’s historical Bronzeville area and conveniently located  near White Sox’s stadium,McCormick Place, museums and down town Chicago. 
Uber’s are a quick  inexpensive way to get around town and public transportation is a ten minute walk.

Uber and public transportation

additional_house_rules: All bookings require a security deposit of $500 or more. This deposit will not be charged in advance.  For security purposes, we require all guests to provide an ID verification, license, or passport before check-in.   Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds.   Check-in time is any time after 4 P.M. Check-out time is any time before 11 a.m. If an earlier check-in or a later check-out time is desired, then you can send us a request. However, this is not guaranteed. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine.   Our locations do not allow pets.   No parties of any kind are allowed in the unit.  If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $50 for every extra hour of cleaning required.   Guests are not allowed to book a stay in their city of residence.   Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events.   Lost or unreturned keys at the time of checkout will be charged a $100 per set.  If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full.   If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately.   If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance.   When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.  Shoes off, please.qq

description:
Designed with the traveler in mind, this Suite by Cloud9 by Restaurant Row caters to all your needs in a modern, spacious layout with visionary decor and a beautiful view - all within walking distance to some of the city’s most delicious and exciting hotspots.

The  suite offers guests a modern space with custom comforts that are a cut above the usual AirBnB experience. Each room is uniquely designed with its own stylish accents and convenient amenities to give you the perfect mixture of home and away. Are you ready to experience Nightlife in Chicago?

At a Glance

* Custom furnishings 
* Alba Botanical bath and body products
* 55-inch 4K TV’s and sound bars
* Fast Internet 
* Amazon Dot
* Nespresso coffee maker w/ Nespresso pods
*In walking distance to the best bars and restaurants
*Concierge services available from 9am to 10pm (central)

Information about access to the building and unit will be provided 24 hours prior to guest check-in.

The West Loop is a study of contrasts, mixing the bright and chic with the industrial and gritty. With a plethora of new restaurants on Randolph Street and Fulton Market, and the French Market just blocks away, this location offers an authentic experience for a guest looking to see and taste the real Windy City!

Paid parking off premises @ $35/day
house_rules: All bookings require a security deposit of $500 or more. This deposit will not be charged in advance.  For security purposes, we require all guests to provide an ID verification, license, or passport before check-in.   Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds.   Check-in time is any time after 4 P.M. Check-out time is any time before 11 a.m. If an earlier check-in or a later check-out time is desired, then you can send us a request. However, this is not guaranteed. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine.   Our locations do not allow pets.   No parties of any kind are allowed in the unit.  If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $50 for every extra hour of cleaning required.   Guests are not allowed to book a stay in their city of residence.   Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events.   Lost or unreturned keys at the time of checkout will be charged a $100 per set.  If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full.   If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately.   If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance.   When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.  Shoes off, please.qq

description:
Welcome to The Handsome McCormick Loft where you're just steps away from the train, relaxed nightlife, iconic restaurants and McCormick Center! This 3 bdr/2 ba comfy loft is centrally located near the heart of Chicago and perfect for business travelers looking for a great space near McCormick Center or large groups looking for a central location near all that Chicago has to offer!

This recently renovated 3 bdr/2 ba loft like apartment comes with 3 comfy beds, a fold out futon + an air mattress that can both accommodate one and a fully-stocked kitchen for all of your cooking desires! 

There are enough towels and supplies for your entire group, along with bath essentials like shampoo, conditioner and soap

The living room has a Smart TV with Roku so you can stream your favorite movies and shows on demand and we thoughtfully designed the space to give a more modern and comfy feel for you.

The guest has access to the entire apartment!

We are not on-site but are nearby if you need anything!

Welcome to the booming South Loop of Chicago!
You are:

-5 mins drive from McCormick's place
-5 min walk to the train down the street
-Short bus ride to Museum campus
-Quick jump to Soldier Field
-Brewery a block away
-Near Chinatown and downtown

The Cermak-McCormick Place train stop is just a 5 min walk down the street and is the best way to get around the city! If you have a car, downtown is just a short drive away and we are about 5 mins to the nearest major expressway, I-55 and I-90/94.

Lyfts and Ubers are readily available if needed as well.

This is an apartment building so you will have neighbors. Please be respectful! 

There is street parking in front of the building and along adjacent streets, but it is paid parking.

description:
** Please note that the homeowner lives on site, in a completely separate unit, and may be present during your stay ** 

If you're seeking a welcoming stay to return to after a long day of Chicago explorations, look no further than this vacation rental apartment! Situated on the top floor, this unit features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and sleeping arrangements for 6-8. Spend your days exploring downtown via the L or checking out the thriving bar scene of Logan Square just steps away!

*NOTE: Your safety matters. An exterior security camera is located at the front door, facing out towards the entrance. The camera does not look into any interior spaces*

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: Full Bed | Additional Sleeping: 2 Couches, Rollaway Futon 

From the cozy furnishings to the convenient amenities, this property offers all the comforts of home. You'll love relaxing in the spacious living room after a long day out and about, as it features a flat-screen Smart TV, decorative fireplace, and abundant natural light. The TV also includes an HD antenna with 64 HD broadcast channels.

Create a delicious home-cooked meal in the fully equipped kitchen, complete with essential appliances and several culinary essentials. Neighboring the kitchen is the dining area, which provides seating for 4 guests. 

As the sun sets, grab a bottle of wine or a few brews to enjoy on the furnished balcony overlooking the neighborhood. When you retire for the night, take solace in one of 3 bedrooms, all with cozy sleeping arrangements.

Evolve Vacation Rental wants your vacation experience to be everything you hoped for and exactly what you needed. To make it easy, we help you find a property you love, offer world-class support seven days a week, and make sure our properties are safe, clean, and ready for your stay. Even better, each home has a Guest Contact available 24/7 for anything that’s on your mind. It’s a fresh new approach to vacation rental. Try Evolve today!

Nestled in the Logan Square neighborhood, this apartment makes it easy to access bustling Milwaukee Avenue! An easy 5-minute stroll will have you bar hopping to popular spots like Emporium Logan Square, Revolution Brewing, and Slippery Slope. 

The property is also just a stone's throw away from the California CTA stop on the BlueLine. Hop on the "L" and make your way downtown to visit Chicago's most famous attractions, such as Cloud Gate, Millennium Park, and The Art Institute of Chicago. The BlueLine can also take you directly to and from Chicago O'Hare International Airport - about a 30-minute ride.

If you want to see as much of downtown as you can in one day, take a walking tour or book a boat tour along the Chicago River. While you're in town, be sure to check out Skydeck Chicago, the numerous museums, and 5-star restaurants!

Key Residence Features:
- Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen, flat-screen Smart TV with Amazon Fire TV Stick, free WiFi, a decorative fireplace, central heating and air conditioning, linens, towels, complimentary toiletries, shared coin-operated laundry machines (coins provided), a furnished balcony, 1 garage parking space, street parking, and more! 
- Amazing Logan Square location - just steps from the thriving bar scene and California CTA stop, plus only minutes to downtown! 
- Nearest Commercial Airport: O'Hare International Airport (~11.8 miles away)

access: You will have WiFi and ROKU TV along with  shared laundry.  This small apartment building has 2 units above you.  I curate art exhibitions in your space when it is not occupied and the art will be on the walls and for sale.
description:
Art  & light-filled  Loft style basement apartment  in a vintage  2- flat in the Albany Park, a friendly & diverse neighborhood In Chicago.  We are artists  and very welcoming!  CTA train to downtown is quick & easy. Kitchenette (no stove) & access to shared laundry. 
There is 1 queen bed &  1 sofa sleeper with a NEW mattress.  Its a kind of cranky sleeper sofa so if you are 2 guests  planning to use 2 beds please let me know ahead of time.  There is an additional $10  per night.

Your entry to our basement loft is through the rear door of our 2 flat.  Food delivery is no problem as long as you text (there is no doorbell)
The open floor plan space is comfortable and light-filled. There is room to do yoga or dance!
The bathroom is shower, no bathtub, newly tiled
I supply shampoo, body soap & moisturizer 
Extra towels are in the space already along with iron, ironing board, blow hair dryer
On and off there is noise you can hear from above.  I have a white noise machine in your guest suite and I supply ear plugs
In addition I will pull an extra mattress from sofa onto floor for additional guests (4 total). It’s a queen 6” thick memory foam. See extra costs

You will have WiFi and ROKU TV along with  shared laundry.  This small apartment building has 2 units above you.  I curate art exhibitions in your space when it is not occupied and the art will be on the walls and for sale.

.  I'll be there to greet you  if I can when you arrive during check in  hours. Alternatively I’ll message you instructions for check in
You may encounter my dog outside at times. She’s old and friendly but if she’s out that means I’m around. If it bothers you just let me know

Albany Park is the most diverse, ethnically, racially and economically in the city and has been for a while.  Next to Northeastern Illinois University and North Park University.

CTA train, CTA bus,  Lift & Uber, car (parking available at additional cost)  Parking on street is permitted and I'll have permits available.

We've put together a little introduction to our neighborhood and others: Chicago is the city of neighborhoods
Menus, special events, good internet links to check out whats going on, transportation maps.
There is a grocery store a block away. It is not a chain but has a good selection of items especially beer, wine
And ethnic foods
house_rules:
- smoking is permitted in backyard only & not  near any windows.  Please clean up all cigarette butts(debris)
- Check in time 4-11pm  Check out 11am
Please note check out procedures in House Manuel

- Do NOT throw anything off the balcony, fine could be up to $500 by the city of Chicago (I cannot help you here)
- No pets allowed
- No loud parties
- Controlled noise level as not to disturb neighbors
- You will be fined an additional $150 per disturbance call from the building management.

- No smoking inside, please do so outside of the building. Do not throw any waste out from the windows (Including cigarette butts!)
- Extra unreported guests will be charged at full price of the daily rate
- Late checkout without notifying the host will be charged the full daily rate of the next day

additional_house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $400 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.

description:
Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, we’ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. Each space is designed and run by us, so you’ll always know what to expect from your stay. At Sonder, we’ve combined the best parts of home and hotel.

- 24/7 support via text, email, or phone
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided
- Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive
- Self check-in

- In-suite laundry
- Fully-equipped kitchen
- Private balcony
- Free private parking

Lincoln Park highlights
- Walkability score: 97
- 5 minute walk to Sapori Trattoria (Italian eatery featuring housemade pasta)
- 2 minute walk to Kingston Mines (live blues music club with BBQ eats)

Getting around
- 6 blocks to Fullerton subway station 
- 30 minute drive to downtown
- 60 minute drive to ORD Airport

With its historic landmark districts, brick row houses, and tree-lined streets, Lincoln Park is as charming as Chicago gets. Sitting along Lake Michigan, this leafy North Side neighborhood is home to restaurants, boutique shops, cafes, and live music clubs, where young professionals mix with the hip college crowd from nearby DePaul University. During the day, the neighborhood’s sprawling namesake park—with its gardens, paths, museums, and beaches—provides a welcome respite from the hustle-bustle of the big city.

There is no elevator.

access:
***** 5-Star Airbnb house, comfort and treatment, Airbnb Super-Host Status that lives in the house*****
- At check in, there will always be someone responsible for your access to the home. Just ring the bell or knock at the front door upon arrival.
- Free parking in driveway
- Front door key available for 24 hour access made available at check in.
- Clean, uncluttered, quiet, peaceful comfortable modern rooms. 
- Room A with Queen size bed
- Room B with Queen size ded
- 2 private bathrooms, 1 shared 1/2 bathroom
- Free Wi-Fi access
- Fully stocked large chef kitchen shared with host.
- House in area with no traffic, relaxing.  
- Walking distance from a post-office, a deli, a billiard, a family restaurant, a bank, a Catholic church, a small Baptist and Greek Orthodox church.
- House surrounded by open green areas a free park with jogging, exercise, tennis court, basketball court, baseball. Free water park for kids
description:
Stay at the beautiful Presidential House with the white fence gardens next to a quiet park in a safe suburb. Superhost status. Near to I-55, I-294, LaGrange Rd and Archer, Toyota Park, Hinsdale & Bolingbrook. Free parking for up to 2 cars in driveway. House is modern with bright natural light. 
Bedroom A: Queen bed
Bedroom B: Queen bed
Rooms A & B share a bath.
Good for a small family with kids or group. Priced for 2 people; listed for 4 max.

- Relaxing quiet house located in an area with no traffic.
- AIRBNB Super-Host status. This is NOT an ENTIRE PLACE. It is my home and I live here.
- Private clean, uncluttered, quiet, peaceful comfortable modern 2 new room. 1.5  bathrooms.
-Large open lay-out with large shared common areas to socialize: kitchen, large family room with fireplace, and den with a outdoor deck for breakfast.
 - Walking distance from a post-office, deli, billiard, family restaurant, bank, Catholic church, small Baptist and Greek Orthodox church.
- House surrounded by open green areas a free park for jogging, exercising, a tennis and  basketball court, and a baseball diamond. Free water park for kids in the summer.

***** 5-Star Airbnb house, comfort and treatment, Airbnb Super-Host Status that lives in the house*****
- At check in, there will always be someone responsible for your access to the home. Just ring the bell or knock at the front door upon arrival.
- Free parking in driveway
- Front door key available for 24 hour access made available at check in.
- Clean, uncluttered, quiet, peaceful comfortable modern rooms. 
- Room A with Queen size bed
- Room B with Queen size ded
- 2 private bathrooms, 1 shared 1/2 bathroom
- Free Wi-Fi access
- Fully stocked large chef kitchen shared with host.
- House in area with no traffic, relaxing.  
- Walking distance from a post-office, a deli, a billiard, a family restaurant, a bank, a Catholic church, a small Baptist and Greek Orthodox church.
- House surrounded by open green areas a free park with jogging, exercise, tennis court, basketball court, baseball. Free water park for kids

Ring the bell or knock on the front door. You will be shown to your room and tour the spaces 
We like our privacy, are friendly and can help with directions, activities and info about Chicagoland. If you like, you can socialize and watch TV or movies with me in the large family room.

Willow Springs is between both O'Hare and Midway Airports with easy access to two major Interstate highways: I-55 into downtown and the first ring road: I-294
Quiet safe block. House in the corner in front and next to a beautiful tree line quiet park with 2 baseball diamonds, a picnic shelter, free waterpark for kids, playground, free tenis court, basketball court. Area with plenty of trails and jogging courses
Only one neighbor on the right. Modest very quiet safe area. 
The suburb is surrounded by woods, lakes, rivers with plenty of human and horse trails and bike paths.
Willow Springs is home to historic quaint small restaurants, pubs, cafes and sandwich shops from fancy pricier to super cheap family breakfast and lunch joints.
Short drive to large shopping areas and malls: Orland Park, Willowbrook, and Bolingbrook

- PERSONAL CAR:
Drive into Chicago via I-55, usually 20 minutes except at rush hour traffic from 6:30AM to 9AM and 3PM to 6:30PM. My place is next to I-294 1st ring road around Chicago. Easy access  north to Wisconsin, and East/South to Indiana, Michigan and Ohio.

- COMMUTER TRAIN:
Safe walk 6 block 13 minutes to Willow Springs Train Station. 3 METRA commuter trains at the Heritage Corridor (HC) into Chicago in the morning (at 6:09AM, 6:49AM, and 7:32AM). 4 trains return back to Willow Springs in the afternoon from Chicago Union Station (at 2:45PM, 4:50PM, 5:25PM, and 6:12PM). The cost is $5:75 one-way. Available during weekdays only.

- ENTERPRISE-RENT-A-CAR:
You can be picked up and drop back by Enterprise-Rent-a-Car in Countryside, which is open daily to rent an affordable vehicle. Cheaper than at the airports.

-UBER or LIFT
$26-$36 to Downtown/Grant Park one way.
$12 -$14 to Midway Airport. You can take the ORANGE Subway line from Midway Airport into Chicago Loop.

- TAXIS 
available

- FROM MIDWAY AIRPORT: 
Rent a car,  UBER About $13 better than Taxi which charge. Do not take the bus, it takes too long. The CTA (subway) Orange line to/from downtown ends at Midway Airport.

- FROM O'HARE AIRPORT: 
Rent a car or, Shuttle, Taxi or UBER.
If you drive: there are toll roads from this airport.

Perfect for:
-Tourist family or group visiting Chicago; have their own car; rent a car; take UBER; or want ride the weekday commuter train into the city.
- Families attending a weeding or wedding parties.
- Participants or attendants at one of the many festival downtown Chicago or at Toyota Park.
- Small group who want to picnic, hike, bike, canoe or visit the lakes, parks and trails of Cook County Preserves.
- Families visiting Brookfield Zoo.
- Visitors to Moraine Valley Community College.
- Shoppers to Orland Park and Oakbrook Malls and boutiques.
- VIPs, artists or famous people that need discretion and privacy and do not want to call attention to themselves while in the Chicago area.

access: ENTIRE APARTMENT WITH PRIVATE ENTRANCE
description:
JUST RENOVATED, 1 BDRM/1BTH APARTMENT   
SUNNY SOUTHWESTERN EXPOSURE WITH A/C
MODERN KITCHEN WITH ALL NEW APPLIANCES, TOASTER, BLENDER, COFFEE MAKER AND MORE.
THIS COMFY APARTMENT COMES WITH ROKU TV, FAST WI-FI, HARDWOOD FLOORS, WASHER, DRYER AND BALCONY.
QUIET PROPERTY IN RESIDENTIAL AREA. PROPERTY COMMON AREA IS MONITORED BY SECURITY CAMERAS. CORPORATIONS ARE WELCOME
30 MIN. TO CHICAGO DOWNTOWN, 20MIN TO AIRPORT, 13MIN. TO  NORTHWESTERN UNIVERSITY. 2 BLOCKS TO TARGET.

SPARKLING CLEAN

ENTIRE APARTMENT WITH PRIVATE ENTRANCE

If needed, I'm available in person.

Skokie lies approximately 15 miles north of Chicago's downtown loop. Skokie's streets, like that of many suburbs, are largely a continuation of the Chicago street grid, and the village is served by the Chicago Transit Authority, further cementing its connection to the city.
This is a quiet residential street.

The Location
Location really is everything, especially when it comes to modern living. The idea of a modern apartment is closely tied to city life. So for a modern look and feel, you want centrally located apartment, that is close to all of the modern luxuries the city offers: shopping, office space, transportation, parks, restaurants, and night life. Most things should be within easy walking distance or a quick bus or train ride.
This apartment is five blocks from highway I-94 EDENS. 
3 blocks from train -Skokie Swift -Dempster stop. Swift is connected with Chicago's CTA and will transport you to Chicago downtown loop

The floor plan
The floor plan itself can determine whether the interior of the apartment is modern. Our modern floor plan is typically open, minimal, and flows easily between rooms. This apartment comes with large windows and doorways, a connected dining room and kitchen, and lots of lighting. Modern floor plans are all about utilizing space and light.
   
    The Amenities
Modern apartments are known for their amenities and commodities: for example, a  free washer and dryer and fast WiFi.  If you commute to work, we included safe and convenient parking spot, just next to your apartment's door. 

   The Style
Of course, there’s the décor and the design of an apartment. Even with a great floor plan and location, the wrong décor can feel out of place.  Our apartments are bright with bright colors, interesting textures, and eclectic combinations of decorative accessories.

     The Management
Last, but not least, you’ll want to get to know the management team of the apartment complex. You may think that a modern apartment is based mostly upon what you can see on the surface, but the management is behind it all. They’re the ones who will make sure your Internet service is always working, your water is always running, and your building is always in top shape. An apartment is only as modern as its management!
house_rules:
Quiet hours 10pm-8am
No Laundry 9pm-8am
No Smoking
No Parties
No gatherings inside or outside property
No shoes inside 
No Dogs

access: Shared living room, kitchen, sunroom, balcony, 2 flat screen TVs, cable & wifi.
description:
Modern, comfortable 3800sqft 5bed/3bath penthouse condo with sunroom & private balcony. Walk to the Obamas, Lake Michigan, numerous local parks (great for kids), restaurants on 53rd street, University of Chicago & museums, less than 20 minutes to downtown Chicago & McCormick Place convention center, less than 30 mins from  Midway Airport and 40 minutes to O'Hare International Airport. 1 bedroom has an ensuite bath. 2nd bedroom has a shared hallway bathroom.

Huge newly renovated modern penthouse condo with original crown molding you can't help but fall in love with. Heated floors & marble tiles in hallway bathroom.

Shared living room, kitchen, sunroom, balcony, 2 flat screen TVs, cable & wifi.

As little/as much as needed by our guests.

Across the street from 45th Presidents home. Walk to Lake Michigan, University of Chicago, restaurants on 53rd street, wholefoods & target, &  Museum of Science & Industry, Less than 15 minute drive to McCormick Convention Center,  South Loop (downtown),Adler Planetarium, Shedd aquarium,  White Sox stadium (guaranteed rate field), Chicago Bears stadium (soldier field). Beautiful histortic Hyde Park neighborhood.

CTA bus stop within steps of the building and walking distance to the Metra. We are only a 20-minute drive to downtown Chicago (estimated $6 uber pool ride), Midway Airport and McCormick Convention Center. 34-minute drive to O'Hare International  Airport.

We have a well-behaved toddler and an infant who sleeps through the night. Crib and playpen are available if needed for guests with small children. We are also a stone's throw away from the Obama's.

access: You'll have full access to the apartment as well as a shared washer and dryer in the building's laundry room.
description:
UNDER NEW MANAGEMENT! 
We are pleased to announce SuperHost Nicole and her team are taking over management of this apartment for us as of Aug 1. We have a new bed, restocked supplies and parking permits, sorted out key confusion and are all around taking steps to raise guests' experiences. We look forward to hosting you!

Contemporary 1 bedroom in the Wicker Park. Brand new kitchen and minimalistic decor. 

A perfect space for a long stay or weekend getaway! The unit has all the comforts of home. We provide all the towels, linens, toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, body wash, lotion, etc.) and coffee/tea to get you going in the morning! TV has Netflix and Amazon Prime for you to enjoy!

The unit can sleep 4. Two in a queen bed with mattress topper in first bedroom (note bed frame is new as of Sept 2019) and two on the pull out sofa in the living room.

Steps from top bars, restaurants, grocery store and public transit! The location is perfect - 2/3 blocks to everything, while tucked away on a quiet street. Steps from top bars, restaurants, grocery store and public transit!

*SPECIAL NOTES*
This unit is a garden level unit and there can be some noise from upstairs guests, so this unit may not be the best for light sleepers. We do provide two white noise machines for bedroom and living room sleeping! *

Laundry is available, but we request you avoid using it between 10am-4pm if possible as that is when our cleaning team uses it for turnovers. *

Parking passes available for $10 a day**.

You'll have full access to the apartment as well as a shared washer and dryer in the building's laundry room.

Our team is always available through airbnb message, and that's the fastest way to reach us. In urgent cases, we are also available in person.

You will be a few blocks from the hottest restaurants, bars and clubs in Chicago.  Wicker Park is, simply put, one of the best neighborhoods in the city. Think Brooklyn, Austen, or Madison.  Michelin star restaurants like Schwa co-exist with some of the world's best dive bars.  The nightlife in the summertime is can't miss.

You'll be about 2 blocks from the blue line, which will take you to "the loop" in about 5 minutes.  You are a short walk to a wide range of restaurants and bars.

AC/Heat - The apartment's heat and AC is controlled by the 2nd floor unit. We provide additional floor fans and space heaters for your apartment to help regulate the temperature. If you need additional assistance, we will be able to help.

description:
This property is a 1320  square feet,  2 Bedroom, 2 bathroom accommodation located in Chicago.  Upscale, dog-friendly suite w/ shared pool, lake views, & luxury amenities! offers 1 King bed, 1 Queen bed. It can host 6 people.  This accommodation features washer/dryer. Please see the description below or inquire for more details!

If you have plans to come to Chicago, stay in this upscale high-rise suite for a convenient and luxurious getaway. Whether you're here for pleasure or business, this two-bedroom, two-bath vacation rental for six guests offers posh amenities, including a shared pool, onsite fitness room, basketball courts, and running track, as well as a club room with a pool table and pinball, a library with a fireplace, and much more. It's even dog-friendly with an additional pet fee.

You'll be a few blocks from Lake Michigan and within walking distance from the city's finest restaurants, the business district, and conventions and trade shows, as well as shopping at Michigan Avenue, Magnificent Mile, and Water Tower shops. McCormick Place is a short cab ride away, and for entertainment, attend the symphony, peruse museums, or attend a play, concert, or sporting event. The building provides an onsite parking garage. 

Revel in the opulence of your spacious home base, complete with wood floors, contemporary furnishings, tasteful decor, and floor-to-ceiling windows giving way to views from the 35th floor. The living area features a large, flatscreen HD LCD cable TV and DVD player. The bedrooms also have HD LCD TVs, and there's free WiFi as well. The state-of-the-art kitchen boasts granite countertops and stainless appliances, and this home also has a private balcony, central air, a private washer/dryer, and a foldable queen mattress cushion in addition to the beds. Other amenities include a 24-hour door attendant, sauna and steam rooms, outdoor grills, putting green, full business center, and an onsite supermarket and dry cleaner. 

Live the high life when you come to the Windy City and stay in this extravagant luxury getaway. Make your reservation today!

*Outdoor pool open Memorial Day-Labor Day (Weather Permitting)

* Please be aware that all guests must be at least 25 years of age unless accompanied by parent or legal guardian.

**PARKING IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE COST OF YOUR STAY** 
There is a parking garage on the bottom floor of this building, but guests are responsible for the cost. Guests bringing vehicles will need to purchase parking passes from LAZ Parking.

City of Chicago License #2209850

On-Site parking.Parking.Private parking.

description:
Modern, private 2-bedroom English basement/garden unit in a incredibly convenient location. Under a 5 minute walk to El Blue line Belmont station and right off of the highway. We are halfway between O’hare and downtown. Hop on the El and get downtown in 20 minutes! We are also 0.5 mile from a number of bars, restaurants, cafes, and shops in the heart of Logan Square.

We had fun updating our English Basement; we hope you enjoy - especially the fun bedrooms!

We are available for questions or support by email or text throughout your stay. We will welcome you and make sure you are settled when you arrive, but otherwise, we will give you space.

We live in a family friendly neighborhood close to the heart of Logan square

We recommend the El, but if you’re not traveling during high traffic time, it’s easy to get around by car as we are only a 2 minute drive to I-90/I-94. We also walk around our neighborhood and into Logan Square often.

We have street parking passes. If you need one, let us know in advance — this way, we’ll have one ready when you arrive.

additional_house_rules:
Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund. 

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable.
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.
6.) Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence.  Additionally, lost keys will incur a $50 per key fee.

description:
*SPECIAL* Jan-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Lincoln Park apartment is right in the middle of it all! Minutes to some of the best restaurants, shopping, & culture in the city - and right around the corner from DePaul. My place has three bedrooms and spacious common areas, so it's ideal for families or groups of friends traveling together - book today!!

You enter my condo into a light-filled open living room with a semi-private desk area. Just off the living room, facing the street, is a bedroom with two twin beds. Down the hall is the condo's shared bathroom - also where the washer and dryer is located - and a bedroom with a queen bed. At the rear of the condo is the kitchen and another bedroom with a queen bed.

In Lincoln Park, Chicago's motto urbs in horto—or "City in a Garden"—truly comes to life. Historic churches and handsome brick row houses nestled within landmark districts sit next to peaceful parks, while quiet, tree-lined residential areas give way to bustling business corridors.

We're less than a 5 minute walk to the Armitage Brown line station, and just steps to the Halsted and Armitage buses - you won't have any trouble getting around town without a car from here! If you do bring your car, however, we offer free parking on-premises.

My apartment is located along a lively section of Halsted street, with many restaurants and bars open late into the evening.  While perfectly situated for exploring my neighborhood, guests who are sensitive to noise should be aware of the liveliness of the area.

access: You can park in our driveway. Enjoy our back yard and flowers in season.  And the backyard swing!
description:
14 Minutes from O'Hare and 9 minutes off I-294. 

Quiet, spacious, basement unit: (1) 12x10 comfy private bedroom with an open 12x15 furnished living room including a wifi work station, couch, and an exercise treadmill.  Full private bath is on main floor.

Personal microwave. Shared use of refrigerator.   Free use of clothes washer and drier. 

Walking distance to Chicago Metra in Des Plaines . Short 30 min train trip to Ogilvie Transportation Center and attractions in downtown Chicago.

An optional upstairs bed room can be added to the reservation for an additional cost. Contact us about it when making your reservation

You can park in our driveway. Enjoy our back yard and flowers in season.  And the backyard swing!

We tend to be friendly! Hope that is o.k. We have no pets to compete with your pets. Just Us two!

We live in Des Plaines, yes, the town is flat, easy for walking with a lovely park facility indoor track and outdoor walking path .5 mile up the street. And the Mystic Waters family fun water park nearby.

Downtown Des Plaines is the historic Choo Choo Restaurant.  Pot Bellies, Panera, Via Roma with fine dining also nearby. Enjoy brosing in Des Plaines modern four floor library.

And the Rivers Casino and the All State Arena provide all star entertainment and are just short distance drive away.

Need a ride? Uber is fast and reasonable.

Extra charge for dog and cat pets. service dogs are free.  (all animals must be house broken.)

additional_house_rules:
- Check-in time is 3:00 pm. Let us know if you need a different time and we'll do our best to accommodate.

- Please be respectful of our neighbors, and please remove your shoes when inside. Smoking is not allowed  in the building. No pets or illegal drugs please.

- Our building has required quiet hours from 10:00 pm to 8:30 am. No loud conversations, TV, music, or anything like that during those hours please. 

- This is a great space for a fun trip or extended work assignment, but not the right place for parties.

- Above all, have a great time!!

access: Guests may access the entire home. The large back deck is also available to enjoy the sunshine, though please keep in mind it is shared with the other homeowners.
description:
In the heart of Lakeview, still close to downtown, museums and McCormick Place. A quick stroll to the lake, beach, park, zoo, Wrigley Field, Trader Joe's, Mariano's, movie theater, great bars and dining including Bar Pastoral, Bobtail Ice Cream, Intelligentsia Coffee, and more!

This is a large, bright, recently renovated two-bedroom, two-bath condo with high end furnishings and many great details. 

- Large living room with fireplace and 60" HDTV with Xfinity cable including premium channels, as well as a Roku and Blu-Ray DVD player. Enjoy your favorite binge-worthy shows on Netflix, Hulu, HBO and Showtime!

- Kitchen with bar stool seating and a dining table that seats 6, fully equipped with stainless steel appliances. An incredible cup of morning coffee or espresso is provided by the Starbucks Verismo.  Make your own gourmet meals or just enjoy great take-out!

- Spacious master suite with queen bed and seating area, marble master bath featuring a separate tub and shower.

- Second bedroom sleeps four with two queen beds. Plenty of closet space! Second full bath as well, no need to wait for the shower!

- Large back deck, which is shared with the other homeowners.

- Free laundry within the apartment.

Guests may access the entire home. The large back deck is also available to enjoy the sunshine, though please keep in mind it is shared with the other homeowners.

We will meet you at our place for check-in and a quick tour. We live and work close by, and are available to help with anything you may need! Just call or text!

East Lakeview is a safe, vibrant neighborhood and our condo is steps from everything. Though it's bustling with activity, we're on a nice leafy street so you'll still get a great night's sleep. With a 96 walk score it's a walkers paradise!

Here are a few of the things we love about Lakeview:

- Great restaurants and bars abound (we love Bar Pastoral, Ceres Table, Dryhop Brewing, Stan's Donuts and Uncommon Ground), all within an easy walk.

- Great coffee shops (boutique gems like Intelligentsia, solid nationals like Peets and Starbucks) are around the corner.

- Wrigley Field and the Wrigleyville bars and restaurants, about a 15 minute walk away.

- All the glitz and excitement of the Boystown neighborhood is a 5-8 minute walk away.

- A full-service Mariano's grocery store is just around the corner, and Whole Foods is a 5 minute drive away. Great neighborhood amenities like Trader Joe's, Walgreens, CVS, dry cleaners, salons, etc are all within a block or so. Plus we are a few blocks from the small but cute Nettelhorst Farmers Market (open Saturday mornings through October)!

- The lakefront and Lincoln Park are a 5 minute walk away. Great for hitting the beach, running and biking, or just enjoying the greenery and the sunshine!

There are a multitude of ways to get around. 

- Ubers and taxis are plentiful at all hours.

- The major bus lines (22 Clark, 8 Halsted, 36 Broadway, 151 Sheridan, etc) are all within one to three blocks of our condo and can take you anywhere in the city!

- The Brown and Purple line Wellington El stop is just a 5-8 minute walk.

- The Red, Brown and Purple line Belmont El stop is also about a 5-8 minute walk away.

-Divvy bike-sharing station at the end of our block.

- The Loop downtown area is about a 15-20 minute drive down Lake Shore Drive and the McCormick Place convention center is just a 20-25 minute drive down Lake Shore Drive (depending on the time of day).

- We do have a garage parking space, though please keep in mind that it is "city sized" and will fit cars very well though not larger SUVs. We also have overnight street parking permits for our guests!
house_rules:
- Check-in time is 3:00 pm. Let us know if you need a different time and we'll do our best to accommodate.

- Please be respectful of our neighbors, and please remove your shoes when inside. Smoking is not allowed  in the building. No pets or illegal drugs please.

- Our building has required quiet hours from 10:00 pm to 8:30 am. No loud conversations, TV, music, or anything like that during those hours please. 

- This is a great space for a fun trip or extended work assignment, but not the right place for parties.

- Above all, have a great time!!

description:
West surburb of Chicago, a nice neighborhood for living!

There are four bedrooms. Three bedrooms including master room on second floor. One bed room on first floor. Guests can cook in kitchen. There is a long dining table in big room. Guests will find wifi code after booking. 
Xifinity 150 Mbps Internet and stream TV.

Please text me for any questions about my house.

Very nice neighborhood! It's 10 minutes walking to Westmont Metra station and downtown. You may take train to Union station in downtown Chicago around 25 minutes. Couple nice resturant in Westmont downtown. 10 minutes drive to Oakbrook shopping mall. 30 minutes to downtown Chicago. 25 minutes to  Ohare and Midway airport through highway when less traffic.  Nearby Hinsdale, Clarendon Hills, Lisle, Naperville...west surburban star towns.

Recommend brunch Gordon Basket resturant in Westmont downtown. You will find grocery Nature's Best Foods too when you go to the resturant. Address is 257 N Cass Ave, Westmont, IL 60559

description: Extremely spacious, sunny and comfortable two story (with elevator) 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom condo in the heart of Lakeview. Walking distance of the lakefront, countless restaurants, shops, grocery stores, the list goes on and on! 1 King, 2 Queens, 3 full baths including a jacuzzi in the master. 3 Lovely Decks to enjoy in the summer months with BBQ. Fabulous fully equipped gourmet kitchen with wine fridge and double oven.  Living room with gas fireplace opens up to kitchen and dining room.

access: Access to washer and dryer in shared area next to suite is available for free on request, but is normally locked. Nothing else is shared space, although we are happy to visit with folks if you'd like. Otherwise the place is great, because you never have to see us!
description:
This "mother-in-law suite" is clean, completely private and super convenient. A separate side entrance leads to mud room & interior door, then living room with TV, sofabed & elliptical. Bedroom has queen and double beds. Down the hall is a full kitchen and bath with shower & tub. Great neighborhood - just 5-minute walk to park, playground, waterpark, and fitness center. The Blue Line train to city, grocery stores and restaurants are all within a 10-minute walk. 15-minute drive to downtown.

Full kitchen with stove, refrigerator, coffee-maker, microwave and breakfast table. Spacious living room with TV (basic cable channels + Amazon Fire Stick) and comfy couch and gym-quality elliptical trainer. Electric fireplace/heater. Full tub and shower in bathroom. One queen and one double bed in bedroom. 

This apartment is completely private - you have your own entrance with key from coded lock box and are separated from the rest of the house. You'll only see us if you want to come visit! It is in the basement of an old house and we have a three-year old and dog upstairs, so you’ll hear that pitter-patter, but we go to bed early and don’t have big parties. 

The location is also great. Easy transport to and from O'hare or Midway and less than ten minute walk to Blue Line, which gets you downtown in 40 minutes. Forest Park itself is very nice with plenty of restaurants and parks. Close to Loyola Medical School.

Access to washer and dryer in shared area next to suite is available for free on request, but is normally locked. Nothing else is shared space, although we are happy to visit with folks if you'd like. Otherwise the place is great, because you never have to see us!

Our family of three, plus peaceful dog live upstairs.  We are available on the spot, but will not intrude on guests unless needed/requested. If we happen to be out of town, then we will have our neighbor available. Private entrance and locked doors separate the suite. It’s an old house so you will likely hear us walking around upstairs, but we do not host parties or stay up late, so it shouldn't bother you. Also it's not possible to bother us with noise, so no worries about getting loud.

Quiet and safe neighborhood with easy access to Blue Line of the "L train" to downtown Chicago. Walking distance to a ton of recreational and commercial opportunities including the Forest Park water park, just three blocks away. Park includes huge pools, play areas and waterslides.

Walk to everything you need. Street parking is free and always available  directly in front of the apartment. You do need to register your license plate with the village by phone or online (this is also free and directions and reminders will be sent!) Train station and bus stops all within 5-7 minute walk.

Early check-in and late checkout are often possible (especially during the weekdays) - just ask! 

Alarm system can be activated on request, but we normally keep it off when guests are in the apartment.

access: You will have access to our 2 car garage behind our home.
description:
Our newly-built home in Logan Square, one of the city's trendiest neighborhoods, has all of the space a family or group of friends traveling together needs - plus easy access to the best restaurants, bars, and shops the area has to offer (though with new appliances, you may find yourself cooking in)! We're a quick walk to the Logan blue line, so it's easy to get to O'Hare or the Loop from here.  Free on-site 2 car garage.  Have a great visit in this spacious, sunny, beautifully furnished house!

You enter - whether from the garage or the street - onto the main level, which is all gathering areas: living areas laid out to take advantage of light, dining areas, and a large kitchen. There's a half-bath on this level as well. Upstairs is the master bedroom with king bed and ensuite bathroom, two additional bedrooms with queen beds and one room with two twins, and another bathroom. On the lower level is a family room, two bedrooms with queen beds, and a full bathroom.

The house sports fast Wifi internet, three Smart 4K TVs, Sonos speakers, Alexa, and games.  Bathrooms are all stocked with essential amenities, including premium shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and fresh towels of varying sizes.  The amazing kitchen has all the necessary utensils and stands ready for your cooking.  All bedrooms have brand new memory foam mattresses.  There is also a new washer and dryer with detergent and dryer sheets.

The house provides great access to all the amazing restaurants and entertainment in Logan Square as well as super convenient highway access to downtown.  The blue-line is a quick walk away.  The neighborhood is safe and welcoming.  There is a two car garage in the back of the property for your use.  24-hour access is available and the host is available anytime for anything you may need - including a recommendation to the best entertainment in the area.

You will have access to our 2 car garage behind our home.

Always ready to assist -- do not hesitate to text/call/email/message.  You can see from my reviews that I pride myself on making sure you have a wonderful experience from start to finish.  I'm also flexible with check-in and check-outs when possible and will do my best to accommodate requests.

Boasting gorgeous boulevards and a constantly expanding selection of restaurants and bars, Logan Square is one of the city's trendiest neighborhoods, balancing family-friendly amenities with a thriving nightlife. Walk along Milwaukee Avenue and you'll find cocktail bars and gastropubs as well as dive bars and late night eateries, all packed with young crowds watching local bands or playing vintage arcade games. The variety of diversions present in Logan Square attracts record lovers, musicians, pinball wizards and dining aficionados to this scenic section of Chicago.

This Northwest Side neighborhood is rich in working class traditions and low-key charm. Its industrial character continues to evolve as longtime residents welcome the influx of artists, young professionals and new families drawn to the area's affordable homes, easy access to downtown and multicultural heritage.

We're a 10 minute walk to the Logan Square blue line station, and just steps to the Diversey and California Ave. buses - you won't have any trouble getting around town without a car from here! If you do bring your car, however, we offer on-premises garage parking and a close shot to highway on-ramp.  Most of our guests grab an Uber / Lyft  and enjoy the quick ride to downtown Chicago!

Pack-n-Plays and high chairs for infants are available.  Sleeps 12 in one king, four queens, and two twin beds with memory-foam mattresses, and sleeps an additional 4 in one queen-size sofa bed and one luxury queen Aerobed.  The house also has two other large sofas that can be utilized as necessary.
interaction: Always ready to assist -- do not hesitate to text/call/email/message.  You can see from my reviews that I pride myself on making sure you have a wonderful experience from start to finish.  I'm also flexible with check-in and check-outs when possible and will do my best to accommodate requests.

Super convenient to Northwestern University, Evanston, Morton Grove, Glenview, North Shore, Old Orchard Mall.

access: Guests will have access to our entire apartment, and no spaces are shared with other tenants.
description:
Welcome to our cozy, classic 2 bedroom apartment just steps to DePaul University! 

Guests will enjoy our comfy memory foam beds and a great location just down the street from the L. We've carefully stocked and furnished the apartment so that our guests feel right at home.

We would love to host you for your upcoming stay. Our home is great for business travelers, families of DePaul students, sports fans looking to catch a game at Wrigley, and everything in between.

This space is a classic Chicago 2 bedroom, located in an apartment building shared with long term tenants. 

The living room features a brick fireplace, a pullout couch for larger groups, and a Smart TV that grants access to all your favorite streaming services. 

Our kitchen is small but very practical. We've stocked it with all the basic cooking utensils and cookware so you can share a meal at our dining room table. It would be tough to make a grand feast but we find that guests like to be able to make a meal at home to save their money for more fun Chicago activities. :) 

The larger bedroom has a memory foam queen sized bed and the smaller bedroom has a full-sized mattress. Both bedrooms have full closets so that guests can fully unpack and feel at home.

Guests will have access to our entire apartment, and no spaces are shared with other tenants.

We have self check-in so you may come and go as you please. If you need to get in touch, we are always just a message away!

Chicago's DePaul neighborhood is situated halfway between downtown and Wrigley Field, which makes it great for summer travelers looking to see a lot of the city.  We are also just 3 stops away from Chicago's Vic Theatre which is a great place to catch a concert! If open water is what you desire, you can go just 10 minutes to the east and see Lincoln Park Conservatory and Zoo before heading down to North Ave beach.

The Fullerton "L" station is just about a 5 minute walk away. From there, you can go practically anywhere in the city. If you want to get off the beaten path a little bit more, you can always catch a city bus just about a block away. Overnight parking in our area can sometimes be tough, so you may want to check out one of the parking spot apps in the city such as SpotHero.
house_rules:
PLEASE NOTE THAT WE CHARGE PER GUEST AFTER A SET NUMBER. PLEASE PROVIDE THE ENTIRE GROUP COUNT IN YOUR RESERVATION REQUEST. IF AN UPDATE TO THE GROUP COUNT IS NEEDED AFTER CONFIRMING THE RESERVATION, THE RESERVATION COST MAY INCREASE.
- Quiet hours between 10pm - 7am
- Smoking Penalty: $500 + damages
- Pet Penalty: $500 + damages
- Late Check Out Fee: $25/half hour

description:
Our 300 square foot Deluxe King room features exposed brick walls and floor-to-ceiling windows with views of Clark Street and the vibrant Wrigley neighborhood. Get cozy in our plush king beds outfitted with crisp white sheets and feel refreshed with our custom-tiled bathroom complete with contemporary finishes.

In room amenities include: locally curated minibar, plush bathrobes, luxurious bedding, WiFi, in-room dining, 50” SmartTV, boutique bath products, garment steamer, and rooftop access

Nestled in between Chicago’s boisterous restaurants and lively bars, The Wheelhouse Hotel is walking distance from the Addison El stop on the red line and a quick one block walk from historic Wrigley Field. Whether you’re in town for a baseball game or looking to explore the city on a more local level, let our luxe accommodations, unexpected surprises, attentive service, and delightful design be the backdrop to your Windy City stay.

The hotel is staffed 24/7.

24 hour reception desk

description:
Sunny top floor condo conveniently located near public transportation. Large condo with luxury finishes, 10 foot ceiling, exposed brick and hardwood floors. Large windows with lots of natural light and quiet conditions. Open concept floor plan. Stainless appliances,  granite counters and a breakfast bar opening into the living/dining rooms. Custom closet shelving.  bathroom contains a jetted tub. A vintage patio

In-unit laundry. Central AC/Heat. Hot water 24/7. 
150 MBps internet, Cable TV & Sound Bar System.

I will be available most of the days in the after hours.

Beautiful Lake Michigan beaches. 
College life with Loyola and Norhtwestern being within walking distances. 
I recommend tenants to go to Evanston and wander around.

CTA Redline is 5 minutes (walking distance) from home.
CTA bus is right in front of the house. 
Downtown is 30 minutes far by taking the train.
