access:
The entire condo is yours during your stay! You will not share this condo with anyone outside of your own group!

The roof deck, the gym, the garage, and the lobby are shared spaces and you should be respectful of that.  

Guests may drop off their bags as early as 12PM (noon), after which time we ask that you leave the condo until 4PM to let the cleaners finish cleaning. It's hard to wash the sheets with someone taking a nap! After 4PM, the place is all yours!
description:
Luxury is going above and beyond what you need. Luxury is a massive, stunning condominium in Chicago’s most trendy neighborhood: the West Loop! Luxury is more square feet, a custom rain shower, high end appliances, custom cabinetry, marble counters, oak plank floors and more! Not just coffee, but coffee options. Not just a private patio, but a skyline view roof deck. Skip the cheap apartments with good photos and fake finishes; this ultra luxurious condo is the real deal!

Flooded with natural light and ceilings that soar to 11 feet, the feeling is airy, spacious, modern, ultra luxury.  This is a brand new building from the ground up in 2018! Not just a bathtub, but a deep soaking tub big enough for boobs and knees.  Not just a shower, but a custom glass rain shower large enough to spin around.  Enjoy a private patio with actual privacy, a public skyline view roof deck that isn't a sales pitch or a party, a 24 hour gym with lots of equipment and space to move around, blazingly fast WiFi, a wealth of coffee options/equipment, this space goes so far above and beyond what you'll find in a hotel.  Prepare to be shocked, then amazed, and then just happy.  

*******************************
Want advice?  Looking for that local knowledge? I've got a guidebook telling you all the secrets! I'm from Chicago. I live here. I know the place, and I have an opinion! 


MASTER BEDROOM
- King over king bunk beds
- Walk-in closet
- Balcony view
(En suite bath)
- 32" HDTV with local channels, plus Netflix and Prime Video streaming!

GUEST BEDROOM
- Queen over queen bunk beds
- Closet
- 32" HDTV with local channels, plus Netflix and Prime Video streaming!

LIVING ROOM
- One queen sofa sleeper
- 55" HDTV with local channels, plus Netflix and Prime Video streaming!
- One rollaway bed (for groups of five or more)
- Dining table(seats 6)

KITCHEN
- Stainless steel Whirlpool appliances
- Quartz counter tops and full tile back splashes
- European-style cabinets
- Bar stool seating 
- Pots and pans, tableware, glassware and silverware provided

EN-SUITE MASTER BATHROOM (FULL)
- Oversized corner glass shower
- Private in-bedroom entrance
- Rain shower head
- Double sink quartz vanity
- Porcelain tile

DETACHED GUEST FULL BATHROOM
- Bold porcelain tile
- Deep soaking tub and shower
- Quartz vanity
- Towels, body wash, shampoo, hair dryer, hand soap, and toilet paper provided in both bathrooms!

PRIVATE BALCONY, with seating

FINISHES
- Oak plank floors
- High-end lighting fixtures
- Nest thermostats
- In-unit stacked Whirlpool washer dryer 
- WiFi throughout unit
- Linens provided! Large closets with hangers, plus iron and board!
- Workout facility featuring cardio, off lobby
- Rooftop deck with incredible city views


----------
PARKING
There are a limited number of parking spaces on site, and they do fill up. They are assigned in order of request by guests with confirmed reservations. 

Please also let me know - what rental category vehicle are you parking? Size restrictions apply, and I need to know the rental category you’ve chosen, even if you aren’t sure of the exact model. (Examples include compact car, full-size SUV, and minivan.)

For additional parking, there’s a garage next door, less than a minute walk, that is very reasonable and super convenient!
----------
CHECK-IN TIME 
Typically, guests may receive the keys and drop their bags in the condo as early as 12PM (noon). The cleaners do need until 4PM to do their work. 
If you'd like to drop your bags early, we can usually accommodate you!
 If you'd like to take a nap or shower right away, and the night before your stay isn't booked yet, let's discuss booking that night before! Then you could arrive as early as you'd like that day! 
----------
CHECK-OUT TIME
11AM is check-out. If you'll need a check-out after 11AM, and the night after your stay isn't booked yet, let's chat about booking that next night! Then you could leave as late as you'd like that day!
Unfortunately we *do not* have anywhere to hold bags after your stay - sorry!
----------
ROLLAWAY BED
The twin rollaway bed is prepared before every stay with fresh linens.
The bed is physically locked into the upright position to help make the bed super easy to move around, and placed in the closet. Simply roll it into place and open. Everything will be ready for you.
----------
OCCUPANCY 
Upon booking, your reservation will have paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number whether visiting or sleeping,  you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first. 
We consider the maximum capacity of the apartment to be its sleeping capacity - eight individuals. Anyone past eight would not be permitted. 
Enjoy the city! Please don’t bring a party back.
----------
RATES
Rates and minimum stays change constantly - every night is different! 
The nightly rate may change based on number of guests, which is verified upon arrival. Please do your best to let me know how many guests will be staying in advance!
----------
We have several condos in the same building - each is its own space!
Feel free to inquire about renting multiple units together!

The entire condo is yours during your stay! You will not share this condo with anyone outside of your own group!

The roof deck, the gym, the garage, and the lobby are shared spaces and you should be respectful of that.  

Guests may drop off their bags as early as 12PM (noon), after which time we ask that you leave the condo until 4PM to let the cleaners finish cleaning. It's hard to wash the sheets with someone taking a nap! After 4PM, the place is all yours!

I love my guests! I am available to my guests! I text my guests most of what they need! I need a number to reach you at! Please confirm your phone number and email address.

IF YOU WILL NOT HAVE A US PHONE NUMBER, please download the WHATSAPP phone texting app!

I also have WeChat - please provide your ID!

- THE WEST LOOP! The definition of industrial chic, this neighborhood has exploded as the city’s trendiest neighborhood! Converted factories and warehouses have transformed into hip restaurants and unique drinking spaces. 
- RANDOLPH STREET, the center of Chicago’s food scene and home to world-renowned spots such as Girl and the Goat, Next, and Au Cheval, is just a short walk! The FULTON MARKET district is a just a bit further, or a quick Uber!
- Five minutes from the nearest BLUE LINE L stop, ILLINOIS MEDICAL DISTRICT. Get downtown in 11 minutes! Or continue out to O'Hare, direct, in 49 minutes. 
- Closest place to stay to the UNITED CENTER, period. Three blocks away, you can the UC from the front door!
- Short walk from the UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT CHICAGO (UIC), Chicago’s only public research university, as well as the surrounding LITTLE ITALY neighborhood.
- Two blocks directly north of RUSH UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL. Short walk from UIC HOSPITAL and STROGER HOSPITAL.

With so many choices in the area, you'll have no idea where to start - until you check out our curated guidebook! We've got tips about coffee shops and grab-and-go breakfast, high-end can't miss dinners, quick meals, late nights and boozy brunch, plus extensive day trips all throughout the city. We put our heart into it, and you’ll find advice on other can’t-miss places worth a train or Uber ride, including FIVE distinct nightlife districts throughout the city!

No need for a car here!
- INSTANTLY get an Uber or Lyft.  This neighborhood has no waiting.
- TWO BLOCKS from the nearest Blue Line 'L' train stop, Illinois Medical District! Take the train direct from O'Hare! Service runs 24/7/365!
- ONE BLOCK to the Jackson Bus or Madison Bus (get downtown in 10 minutes)
- Easy walking distance to the Ashland/Lake Green Line stop!


Take the CTA and go from front door to Chicago's... 

LARGEST INDOOR ARENA
- United Center, Blackhawks Hockey, Bulls basketball: 6 min WALK (.3 miles!)

SELFIE SPOTS
- Millennium Park, the Bean (Cloud Gate), Maggie Daley Park: 22 min
- Riverwalk: 19 min
- Sears Tower / Willis Tower (Skydeck Chicago): 18 min 
- Magnificent Mile / Michigan Avenue shopping, Hancock Center (360 Chicago), Water Tower: 33 min
- Lake Michigan, Oak Street Beach (terrific skyline view): 36 min

WORLD-CLASS CULTURAL INSTITUTIONS
- Art Institute of Chicago: 26 min
- Grant Park, Buckingham Fountain, Chicago Marathon start: 26 min
- Museum Campus, with Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium, Adler Planetarium: 39 min, 18 min Uber
- Chicago Symphony Orchestra: 23 min
- Gene Siskel Film Center: 20 min
- Museum of Contemporary Art: 34 min
- Museum of Science and Industry (MSI): 23 min Uber
- Lincoln Park Zoo: 22 min Uber

BIGGEST THEATER SCENE OUTSIDE OF BROADWAY
- The Chicago Theatre: 19 min
- CIBC Theatre (Hamilton): 20 min
- Goodman Theatre: 21 min
- The Joffrey Ballet: 21 min
- Auditorium Theater of Roosevelt University: 22 min
- Lyric Opera: 21 min
- Lookingglass Theater Company: 32 min
- Steppenwolf Theatre: 38 min, or 16 min Uber
- The Second City: 37 min, or 19 min Uber

SPORTS AND STADIUMS
- Northerly Island Pavilion: 41 min, or 20 min Uber
- Bears football and Soldier Field: 37 min, or 16 min Uber
- Cubs baseball and Wrigley Field: 40 min
- Guaranteed Rate Field, Chicago White Sox: 40 min, or 17 min Uber (we're Cubs fans, but they have good food, and tickets are cheap)
- Wintrust Arena: 30 min

CONCERTS AND FESTIVALS
- Pitchfork, Union Park: 6 min WALK
- Riot Fest, Douglas Park: 30 min, or 13 min Uber
- City Winery (West Loop): 15 min (mostly walk), or 5 min Uber
- House of Vans: 13 min (mostly walk), or 4 min Uber
- House of Blues: 24 min
- Lollapalooza: 29 min

UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES
- University of Illinois at Chicago (UIC): 8 min
- DePaul University: 21 min Uber
- The University of Chicago: 27 min Uber

HOSPITALS AND MEDICAL CENTERS
- Rush University: 7 min WALK, 2 min Uber (if they'll take you that close)
- UIC: 18 min WALK, 13 min bus,  6 min Uber
- Cook County Stroger: 12 min WALK, 5 min Uber
- Jesse Brown VA: 16 min WALK, 5 min Uber

CONVENTION CENTERS
- Merchandise Mart: 25 min
- McCormick Place: 37 min, or 14 min Uber

AIRPORTS AND TRANSPORTATION
- O'Hare (ORD): 54 min
- Midway (MDW): 42 min
- Union Station (Amtrak): 15 min
- Millennium Station (South Shore Line): 27 min
- Ogilvie Transportation Center (Metra): 17 min

OVERRATED TOURIST TRAP
- Navy Pier: 40 min
Unless you have plans at the Children's Museum, Shakespeare Theater, or Imax theater - seriously, skip it. Ask us for recommendations instead.

Parking is subject to availability - I have more condos than spots.

We do not accept instant bookings from residents of the Chicago metropolitan area as identified by profile city or phone number area code. If you live near Chicago and would like to book a stay, please send us a message with a little more information about your plans.

Immediately after booking, we will send you a few questions about your arrival time, contact info, number of guests/visitors, and to name our favorite restaurant, which is listed at the bottom of the house rules. Guests will not be allowed to check in without providing complete answers
house_rules:
1) Smoking and vaping are only allowed on your private balcony with the balcony door shut. The rest of the property is smoke and vapor free. We have marijuana and tobacco chemical sensors on the property. They know it's not cooking smoke, They react to airborne particulate, not the smell on your clothes. The PolySens® technology works, so exit the building if you want to smoke/vape or you'll be fined $500 and asked to leave.

2) Your reservation has paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number, whether visiting or sleeping, you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first.

3) Quiet hours are 10PM-8AM. Noise should not be heard coming from your apartment. This is a quiet residential building. 95% of our guests have no issues, and never hear from us. We will be sure to send you at least 2 warnings prior to asking anyone to leave, but one way or another, the apartment must be quiet.

4) Parties, events, and commercial activity are not allowed.

5) We reserve the right to ask you to leave without a refund if any of the above rules are broken.

6) Lost keys will incur a $100 charge. We have to change the locks. Please use the app to send a picture of all the keys at check-in AND check-out.

7) Our favorite restaurant in Chicago is La Scarola.


Privacy Statement on the Use of Security Cameras:
We respect and value the privacy of our guests. We will never place a camera inside a living space. While Airbnb policy allows cameras in spaces that are not used for sleeping or bathing, we disagree. Cameras should be banned from inside all living spaces. Footage should be automatically deleted. Everything should be disclosed in advance. We use hallway security cameras to verify the number of guests who have entered an apartment. This is useful for stopping parties, and under additional prices extra guest charges may apply for extra people sleeping over.  All footage is deleted automatically after a stay, unless there is an open resolution center case. It’s unfortunate that not every guest is honest about their intentions, and our community would not allow us to be on Airbnb if we did not prevent unwanted behaviors. Let us know if you have questions. We have nothing to hide.

access: The bedroom and kitchen/dining room are accessible to all guests. Refrigerator and microwave access are available in the kitchen/dining room area.
description:
The house is a yellow townhouse with it's own separate gate and fence from the other homes in the area. The entrance is a metal gate facing the street, with a small path through a garden leading to the front door of the home. During the summer, the flowers we grow in the garden are beautiful!

One cozy bedroom can sleep two people in a double bed. There is a dresser with a mirror. Wash towels and amenities are in the dresser drawers.

The bedroom and kitchen/dining room are accessible to all guests. Refrigerator and microwave access are available in the kitchen/dining room area.

Guests are welcome to contact me or my husband via text messaging or calling our cell.

Right on the outskirts of Chinatown, only one block from the heart of Chinatown. There are numerous Chinese stores and authentic Chinese restaurants that cater to tourists within walking distance.
For any special needs, there is a Walgreen's right across the street.
1 mile from the McCormick Place convention center.
2 miles from Downtown Chicago/Grant Park.

Within walking distance to the Chinatown Redline subway station. The station itself is only one stop from the heart of Downtown Chicago going North, and one stop from Guaranteed Rate Field (White Sox Field) going south. The station is right above a very large public parking lot, and directly by the entrance/exit of several major highways, I-90/94 and I-55.

The room is on the third floor, and guests will have to use stairs to access the bedroom.

access: kitchen, open to families, patio, LGBT friendly,  cafe near by, a block and a half from the  Metra, close to the University of Chicago, close to the lake,  FREE wifi,  FREE washer and dryer(please bring your own detergent), cabinet and fridge space.Netflix, , Hulu, Amazon Instant prime.
description:
This  comfortable condo is a stones throw away from Hyde Park and University of Chicago. The space is great for visiting parents, researchers or professors. Your room features wifi, and a 32" TV. Access to the"L", Uber, close to lake, 20 minutes from downtown (depending on traffic). Room can accommodate 3 (4 in a pinch)

Real bed; Room can accommodate 3, two in the bed and one on an air mattress next to the bed. Very comfortable, with moderate light, one window. Free Wifi. , 32" wall mounted TV (Hulu/Netlfix). The bathroom is down the hall a bit but not too far.  The guest bedroom is in the front near the kitchen and our bedroom is in the very back. If you would like to take a ride to the lake Divvy has a bicycle stand walking distance from our condo, the outdoor patio is open for the summer, if you want to enjoy the breeze or BBQ and the living room, the sectional couch, where you can be entertained by Hulu, Amazon Instant Prime or Netflix. Also, if  you enjoy gaming (PS4 & Switch), that is available  as well.  The  heating and cooling can be adjusted to your liking, so please voice your preference (there is also a heater in the room for the winter).  Some closet space is available.  Street parking is available.  Doodash services our area and has a wide array of foods available for delivery. Uber and Lyft is convenient as well.  Coffee available all day, microwave, oven,blender, toaster oven also available.

kitchen, open to families, patio, LGBT friendly,  cafe near by, a block and a half from the  Metra, close to the University of Chicago, close to the lake,  FREE wifi,  FREE washer and dryer(please bring your own detergent), cabinet and fridge space.Netflix, , Hulu, Amazon Instant prime.

We are respectful of guests space and will make the key drop as easy as possible.

Woodlawn is in a blossoming area of Chicago. It is just a stones throw away from Hyde Park and The University of Chicago. It is also about a 20 (30 depending on traffic )minute Uber Drive from Downtown. And about a 20 min Metra ride(we recommend using the Metra). We are not in the suburbs, nor do we live downtown. We are fairly close to downtown, especially if you decide to take the Metra. Please ask us about travel downtown, if you are booking to visit downtown. Our location is prime for those vising UofC, and Jackson Park. If you are coming from overseas, please be sure to get a plan where you have access to the internet. It will be crucial to your stay while out and about. You will find awesome neighborhood eats, shopping and some nightlife in Hyde Park.  The ambiance of the corner cafe is very nice, try the quiche!

The Metra  is a few blocks from the door step, and will take you directly into downtown(Van Buren Stop). From there, the Red Line is your friend or Uber/Lyft  it to downtown. It is 20 - 30 minutes away depending on traffic. Be sure to ask your Uber/Lyft driver to take Lake Shore downtown, take in the magnificent view. We are not in the suburbs, nor do we live downtown. We do, however, live in the city of Chicago. We are fairly close to downtown, especially if you decide to take the Metra. Please ask us about travel downtown, if you are booking to visit downtown*(again we recommend using the Metra). Our location is prime for those vising UofC, and Jackson Park. If you are coming from overseas, please be sure to get a plan where you have access to the internet. It will be crucial to your visit while out and about.

Great space, great neighborhood,  great condo, street parking is available. Sometimes, we cook dinner and you are more than welcome to join.  We have to ask that check in be kept to after 7pm or before 7am during the week.. We do have a lock box however during the winter it has a tendancy to be frozen. If checking in on the weekend, we have more flexibility.

• 1 bedroom with a Queen bed, and a NEW queen size bed in the living room
• Excellent public transit nearby (10min walk to subway)
• 7 min ride to McCormick Center
• 12 min ride downtown
• 70" Smart TV  with Netflix, Amazon Videos and ChromCast. 
• Keyless self check-in 
• First booking on Airbnb? Use this link to receive $30 off your stay: https://www.airbnb.com/c/ahe349?currency=USD

- Quiet hours are after 11PM on the weekdays and 12PM on the weekends.
- Our place is located in Bridgeport with Free street parking! Super easy to get around -> 12min drive/25 min by subway to DT Chicago, 5min drive to Chinatown, 10min drive to McCormick Place, 2min drive to Walgreens, and only steps away from many great restaurants! 
- We have a fully equipped kitchen, Enjoy pool table and a 70'' TV with Amazon videos and Netflix videos! Perfect for family/friends :)

This listing is for the whole basement floor of the house, and has its own separate entrance for the guests. The guests have access to the whole floor for themselves :)

We are available via text, messages and emails at all time.

- FREE Street parking around the whole neighborhood :)
- 12min drive/25 min by Orange Line to downtown Chicago
- 1 block away from closest bus station going downtown
- 5min drive away from Chinatown
- 10min drive from McCormick Place
- 2min drive to supermarket/Walgreens

Quiet hours after 11pm. Please don't host big party or bring pet in our place. The host stays on the 1st floor.

NO smoking allowed inside of the house. 

One thing to note is that the temperature on this floor is control by central heat/AC system. The control is actually on our floor. If you feel too cold or too warm, please message us and we will adjust it for you immediately. We always reply immediately.

additional_house_rules:
Cloud9 House Rules

1. IDs:: All adult Guests (18 and older) must provide ID verification: license, state ID, or passport before Check-in. 

2. Security Deposit:: All bookings require a security/damage deposit of $2500 or more. This deposit will not be charged in advance.
*For last-minute bookings or local stays, damage/security deposit will be held in advance by Cloud9*

3. Cancellations:: Full refund for cancellations made within 48 hours of booking, if Check-in date is at least 14 days away. 50% refund for cancellations made at least 7 days before Check-in. *No refunds for cancellations made within 7 days of Check-in*

4. Check-in:: any time after 4 PM. 
Check-out:: any time before 11 AM. 
*If an earlier Check-in or later Check-out time is desired, please send a request. We can only confirm 24 hours in advance. No guarantee* 
*If an unauthorized late Check-out delays cleaning of the unit, Guests will be charged $100. Any Guest still in the unit after 1 PM will be charged another night (Note: this does not apply if late Check-out was pre-approved)*

5. Violations::
-No smoking or vaping of any kind: $500 fine 
-No pets (please notify us if you have a service animal)
-Lost/missing keys/fobs: $100 each to replace
-Renter is liable for any damage and/or lost/stolen items during occupancy
-If extraordinary cleaning is required: $100 every hour of extra cleaning
-No parties, gatherings, or events
-If the property is used by more than the number of individuals listed in your reservation, we may charge the full security deposit

6. Liability:: Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises and/or using its facilities. It is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises.
-Guests should report immediately to us anything that presents a danger/could result in damage to the location or individuals

When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.

Shoes off, please :-)

description:
Indulge in this sprawling 1,845 square foot Modern Industrial 3 bedroom 2 bath Penthouse apartment in an elevator building set in River West at the gateway to River North & West Loop.

When nothing will do except the very best, Cirro by The Cloud9 Experience awaits.

A modern apartment with luxe amenities serves as your own tranquil retreat.
Marvel at Chicago’s skyline views from the expansive windows or a private 437 sq ft deck completed in Porcelain. Take in the crystalline scene from the chic living room with space for six or eight if need be. Enjoy high tech of todays highest standards such as 65 inch living room TV and surround multiple speaker sound provided by Sonos as well as seriously fast internet thanks to 1GB speeds. Gather in the integrated Chef’s kitchens from Archisesto featuring Liebherr/Miele Appliances outfitted with Le Caphalon Cookware, Zwilling J.A. Henckels silverware and Chef’s knives, Schott Zwiesel wine glasses, Frieling french press or Nespresso for your coffee and much more. Or head to the bedroom to luxuriate in the impossibly soft linens of your pillow top Memory Foam bed. 

Here, there’s no detail too fine—and no standard too high. 

Welcome home.

I give my guests space but am available when needed

River West connects two top Chicago neighborhoods, River North and The West Loop making it the ideal place to stay in the city.

description:
Please note that photos are of a similar Domio in Chicago.

Pair your Chicago experience with the perfect place to stay. Centrally located in the heart of Chicago, this charming space was thoughtfully designed to make you feel at home. Whether traveling solo, with friends, or with family, see the best of architecture, food, and culture that Chicago has to offer and have an unforgettable experience staying at this Domio.

Everything in this home is carefully selected, made and curated according to the Domio standard. This 2 bedroom and 2 bath apartment boasts a lively living room, premium furniture, and exceptional finishes. In addition to a fully stocked kitchen with top of the line appliances, guests will be pleased to find hand picked decor and artwork throughout the home. 

Bedroom 1:
Queen Bed

Bedroom 2:
Queen Bed

Guests have exclusive access to the apartment and have access to the building's fitness center.

We do our best to tailor each experience to our guests preferences. Want advice, suggestions, or a shoulder to lean on? We are always available at your disposal. Need a place to stay but don't feel like chatting? That's okay too, we won't be offended.

Chicago Registration Number: Pending

Please note that we do not allow bookings from residents of Chicago and surrounding areas.

description:
Main Manor is a warm welcoming Evanston home built in 1889. The bedroom suite is spacious yet cozy with a private bathroom. You will be walking distance to the L and Metra train near bakeries, coffee shops, restaurants and more. This home is a comfortable place in which to relax and unwind while visiting Northwestern University, touring Chicago or the Northshore.

Main Manor has a large backyard surrounded by trees with a hammock for warm summer and fall days.

Guests are welcome to:
* Enjoy coffee and treats in the sunny kitchen. 
* Relax read or watch TV in the living room . 
* Meditate in the parlor 
* Nap on the hammock

Southeast Evanston is the best place to stay because we are walking distance to Northwestern  University , restaurants, beautiful Lake Michigan, and a 20 minute drive to Chicago.

Seven minute walk to the L and Metra train and street parking is easy on Asbury.
house_rules: Couples, women, and children are welcome. Quiet hours after 10:00pm.

access: Guests will have access to the entire apartment (with the exception of a locked third bedroom), as well as the patio and rooftop.
description:
This is a 2 bed/2 bath in West Town - 2 blocks from the el, 15 minutes to downtown via transit. A short walk to all the hip bars, restaurants, & art galleries in Wicker Park. Huge patio and amazing rooftop with the best view of the Chicago skyline!

Guests will have access to the entire apartment (with the exception of a locked third bedroom), as well as the patio and rooftop.

The Division Blue Line stop is a 7 minute walk and the 56 bus stops right outside the building.  There is also a Divvy (bike share/rental) station less than a block away at Noble and Milwaukee.
summary: This is a 2 bed/2 bath in West Town - 2 blocks from the el, 15 minutes to downtown via transit. A short walk to all the hip bars, restaurants, & art galleries in Wicker Park. Huge patio and amazing rooftop with the best view of the Chicago skyline!
transit: The Division Blue Line stop is a 7 minute walk and the 56 bus stops right outside the building.  There is also a Divvy (bike share/rental) station less than a block away at Noble and Milwaukee.

description:
In the heart of Roscoe Village. Guest will have utilize the full master bedroom area on the second floor of the duplex up. Private entrance  with private bedroom and bathroom. Only shared space would be the fully equipped kitchen. Blocks from Hamlin Park and access to beautiful backyard with a  gazebo with electricity.  Comes with a queen sized bed, futon, smart tv, minifridge and couch. Wifi access and comes with Large smart TV. I have a small gym and office set up guest can access as well.

Available September 4th.

In the heart of Roscoe Village.  It is blocks from Hamlin Park and the pool.  It is also just blocks from the the grocery stores, Costco, Starbucks and restaurants.

Just blocks away from any public transportation - bus and train.  Blocks away from Divvy ride share station.  Only 2.5 miles away from the beach and lake.

the pricing is per person a night.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $400 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.

description:
Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, we’ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. Each space is designed and run by us, so you’ll always know what to expect from your stay. At Sonder, we’ve combined the best parts of home and hotel.

- 24/7 support via text, email, or phone
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided
- Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive
- Self check-in

- In-suite laundry
- Sleeper sofa
- Fully equipped kitchen 
- Patio

Building amenities
- Fitness center

South Loop highlights
- Walkability score: 92
- 7 minute walk to Eleven City Diner (our favorite brunch spot)
- 3 minute walk to The Scout Waterhouse + Kitchen (catch a game and enjoy some American pub grub)

Getting around
- 7 minute walk to Roosevelt 'L' Station 
- 13 minute drive to Navy Pier
- 28 minute drive to MDW Airport
- 77 minute drive to ORD Airport

The South Loop is a vibrant blend of notable attractions, beautiful parks, and stunning Lake Michigan views. Picnic in the charming green space surrounding Museum Campus, or attend one of the many events at Grant Park such as The Taste of Chicago. Spend the day exploring the countless museums, or journey to the top of the 108-story Willis Tower for breathtaking views of the city.

Exact views from the apartment are not guaranteed, the views could vary from the pictures listed.

There’s no cable. We’ve provided a Chromecast for streaming.
house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $400 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.

access:
Private Apartment.  
All Amenities.
Chicago at your doorstep!
description:
OneEleven - Loop.  Enjoy stunning views of the Chicago River from your apartment before walking to work from this centrally located loop apartment.  In your free time enjoy Michigan Avenue for shopping, as well as museums, restaurants and nightlife at your doorstep. The train, taxis, and buses are all accessible on the same block for even more convenience.

Modern. Clean. All-Inclusive.  Enjoy stunning city and Chicago River views from floor to ceiling windows while having the luxury of premiere shopping, dining, and big city attractions at your doorstep. This spacious apartment includes a designer kitchen with quartz countertops, King Bed and Queen Pull-Out Sofa, white marble mosaic tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances, custom wood-plank flooring, polished natural stone vanities and tri-view medicine cabinets, custom closets with organizers, in-unit washer and dryer and controlled heating/air. 

This 24-hour doorman building features an expansive two level outdoor sundeck including fire pits, private kitchens, lounge area, seating and grills, an expansive health club with towel service, stunning terrace, indoor pool and spa with retractable wall opening to sundeck, tech bar with free printing, screening room, billiards room with TV and custom music system, lounge with floor-to-ceiling windows and another outdoor terrace overlooking the cityscape and a bike room.

Arrive with just your suitcase and we handle everything else for you.  Your automated monthly payment includes all furnishings, linens, kitchen and household items, high speed wireless Internet, unlimited calling nationwide, all utilities, cable TV with flat screen TV/s, access to all amenities, 24-hour maintenance and 24-hour customer service.   We offer month to month contracts with a 31 night minimum and a 14 day notice to vacate.  Parking and maid service are available, and apartment prices depend on your dates of stay.  Book today to start your Chicago experience!

Private Apartment.  
All Amenities.
Chicago at your doorstep!

24-Hour Maintenance 
24-Hour Customer Support

As Chicago's official downtown area, the Loop is one of the most important central business districts on the globe. In addition to its dynamic architecture and buzzing atmosphere, the area has an incredible concentration of cultural institutions, urban park spaces, award-winning restaurants and a shopper's paradise on State Street.
Famous for its striking architecture, the Loop vaunts signature buildings by Ludwig Mies van der Rohe and Louis Henri Sullivan, as well as Aqua by modern day prodigy Jeanne Gang. The area hangout, Millennium Park, complements its surrounding with stunning architectural marvels of its own. The park's crown jewels include a Frank Gehry-designed amphitheater and Cloud Gate, the landmark "Bean" that's become an iconic symbol of Chicago. Nearby Maggie Daley Park and the Chicago Riverwalk are two new engaging outdoor spaces that embrace design — and fun!
In addition to architectural marvels, Chicago's cultural attractions also have a prevailing presence in the downtown Loop. The celebrated Theater District buzzes with Tony Award-winning shows and glittering marquees. The Chicago Cultural Center provides an incredible range of performance and visual arts, while the Art Institute of Chicago is widely considered to be one of the finest institutions of its kind in the world.

Easy bus, train and taxi access. Close to highway.
Walk to Everything!

31 Night Minimum Stay
Parking and Maid Service Available for a Fee
Pet-Friendly Apartments Available for a $500 One-Time Pet Fee
Terms and Conditions Document Sent at Booking for Electronic Signature
Late Check-Out Available 1PM for $40. (Otherwise 11AM Check-Out)
Early Check-In Available 1PM for $40 (Otherwise 3PM Check-In)
Charge for an additional night or all costs associated with failure to check-out if not checked out by 11AM or Late Check-Out Purchased.
$30 Lock-Out Fee after 9PM.
interaction:
24-Hour Maintenance 
24-Hour Customer Support

description:
This is a garden unit condo so there is low light during the day.  Additionally there is adequate privacy and various space to move around. There are two 50 inch televisions in the kitchen and front common space and ample seating as well.  There are outdoor spaces in the both the front and back of the unit.  The back leads to an alley and both accessible to those that want to smoke or get fresh air. Close proximity to United Center and Green Line Stop

access: You will have access to everything in the apartment without limitation. This includes; the patio roof deck, full master bed and bath, guest bed and bath, full kitchen, weight room, in unit laundry, and much more!
description:
Beautiful beautiful Full 2 Bedroom apartment with lofted ceilings, modern appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, and an open floor plan in downtown Chicago's vibrant and historic River West neighborhood. Area is is safe and fun, right at the heart of where any visitor to the city would want to stay. Historic buildings, restaurants, nightlife, and cultural hotpots within walking distance away!

This luxurious suite creates the perfect centerpiece for any trip to Chicago, whether for business, pleasure, or both. Steps from the train, you will also be centrally located in a hub of all that Chicago has to offer in sightseeing, nightlife, arts, and entertainment. The unit is located in the heart of River West, in a haven that has a reputation for being eclectic, interesting, artistic and tightly-woven.

This magnificent building also features balcony and lounge, business center, and more. You will have a two full spacious bedrooms, one with a King bed, the other with queen bed, pull-out couch, and an air mattress within the unit, as well as an IN UNIT washer/dryers, Roku for streaming tv/Netflix, and high speed wi-fi.

You will have access to everything in the apartment without limitation. This includes; the patio roof deck, full master bed and bath, guest bed and bath, full kitchen, weight room, in unit laundry, and much more!

I can be as available or absent as you'd like! However, I am always available to answer any questions you might have during your stay!

Surrounding the Union Pacific railroad tracks, River West is home to a growing population after being rediscovered in recent years by developers and locals alike. Bordered by the Kriver to the east, the area has become a hotspot for those seeking quick travel to both the western suburbs and the Downtown area while still enjoying the buzz of a big-city neighborhood.

The train is located about 400ft. from the front door. Chicago has a wonderful train system, called the "L" to easily get around! Just hop on the train and the city is yours! If that's not your thing, no worries! We are walking distance to great restaurants, night life, etc.. And a short cab ride to the major tourist attractions across the city.

Please feel free to reach out with any questions and I would be happy to answer!

description:
• A small building with an excellent location in the heart of Downtown Chicago.

• 1 minute walk from CTA redline.

• 2 blocks from Water Tower.

• 5 minutes walk from Michigan Avenue.

• Three bedrooms, living room and kitchen.

• kitchen is spacious and contains everything.

• The bathroom is shared.

• There is no elevator in the building but the apartment is in the first floor. 

• TV, NETFLIX and HULU.

• Coffee and coffee maker are available.

• We rent two rooms so guest should expect other guest of all genders.

• Guests have access to all the place (their bedroom, living room, kitchen, and bathroom) except my own bedroom.

• Guests will have their own key and must return it before departing.

• Guests will have access to all bath stuff, shampoo, conditioner, toothpaste, etc..

• Guest can use the kitchen+fridge and feel free to make their own food as long as they clean after.

• Guest will have their own clean towel and bed sheets.

• We live in the apartment and we spend most of our time studying either home or at the library , going to school. 

• We sleep around 11 so it's really quite here.

description:
Basic, comfy air bed and night table.

This is a small, sunny room in beautiful Douglas Park. It has a comfortable air bed, night stand, lap and closet. It's a basic, no-frills stay in a large, vintage house. The property is steps from the Pink Line subway (bus stop across street) taking you to hipster central West Loop/downtown/Sears Tower/Bean/Museums in 10-15 minutes and Lakeview/Boystown in 25m-ish. The area is predominantly Mexican with lots of great eateries. I am very friendly and available for any tourism information you may need! I do have an adorable and very friendly Bull Terrier
$40 cleaning charge for long-term stays over 15 days.

I will be around most of the time.

Up-and-coming area with a huge Park two blocks away and many Mexican and Latino restaurants. Minutes from downtown on the Pink Line Subway.

Pink Line Subway get off at Kedzie Stop. Or 52 Bus runs along Kedzie for quick access to the city including hispter hubLogan Square.
interaction: I will be around most of the time.

access: You are welcome to coffee, tea or juice in the morning in the kitchen,  feel free to sit in the den and unwind. Watch tv or read. There is a refrigerator on the sun porch for your use.  With 20 different restaurants in our downtown area, you won’t go hungry.
description:
There is a newly remodeled bedroom with full sized bed with pillows, closet, desk, dresser and a remodeled private bathroom.  Our home is located 6 blocks from downtown Arlington Hts and the Metra station, where you can easily hop the train to downtown Chicago which is a 40 minute train ride. We are 20 minutes west of O'Hare Airport and 10 min east of Woodfield Mall and  a 20 min car ride from the designer shopping mall in Rosemont.  Downtown Arlington has several restaurants/bars/boutiques.

Your accommodations will be a first floor bedroom and full bathroom. The bedroom features an empty closet,  desk, dress, nightstand for your stay.  There are clean and soft towels, shampoos, body wash and conditioner in the bathroom. The bathroom is well stocked for anything you may need or forget.

You are welcome to coffee, tea or juice in the morning in the kitchen,  feel free to sit in the den and unwind. Watch tv or read. There is a refrigerator on the sun porch for your use.  With 20 different restaurants in our downtown area, you won’t go hungry.

I work from home (on the 2nd floor) so I am always around if you need something.

Downtown Arlington Heights is full of restaurants, boutiques, movie theatre, Starbucks, bars and small eateries.  Its a fun, safe environment for all.  Local park within 6 blocks.

The metra station is a 6 block walk.  If you have a car, you can park in our driveway. There is also PACE bus service, should you need public transportation.

Please note:  we have two dogs and a kitty, however, the house is kept very clean and the pets never enter the guest bedroom unless invited.
house_rules:
Please lock front door when coming back for the evening

Please adhere to check out times

description:
Private room in the heart of Chicago with FREE PARKING, GREEN TEA & ALOE memory foam mattress & an EARLY check-in! (12 p.m) You will have your own door code and may arrive at ANY time and as late as you wish, EASY self check-in guaranteed. 

I allow LUGGAGE DROP OFF! You can store your luggage in the closet before check-in and after check-out times, you can drop it off and pick it up as early and as late as you would like. 

The neighborhood is extremely safe even at night :)

Restaurants and bars are right round the corner, both upscale and casual. This room is 6 minutes away by car or uber to Chicago's famous Willis (Sears) tower. Uber costs about $7. If you are arriving by car, I am providing free resident parking passes for anywhere in the area. (Yes, that means you can drive a few blocks and still park anywhere you want!)

The room will be ONLY yours for the time you'll stay in my Windy City. You will have a key to lock the door. 

> EARLY CHECK-IN TIME! (12 pm)

> QUIET ROOM!

> Free parking provided: park BEFORE your check-in and stay parked AFTER your check-out if you would like

> GREEN TEA & ALOE memory foam mattress

> 5 MIN to DOWNTOWN 

> Restaurants and bars are 5 MIN away walking distance 

> 5 MIN walk to PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION/METRO 

> 3 MIN walk to UIC (University of Illinois at Chicago)

> No security deposit

> Cancel up to 24 hours in advance to get a full refund

> Last minute reservations are welcome!

You will be given a door code to access the apartment and a key to lock your private room. You may arrive as late as you would like with my code entry. You may store your luggage in the closet BEFORE and AFTER check in so you don't have to haul your bags around the city. You will be able to view your check-in instructions under "House Manual" as soon as you confirm the booking. The door code will be sent to you 1 night prior to your arrival, or immediately if you made a last-minute reservation. I am also providing a folder full of recommendations for restaurants, nightlife and places to visit from the local, it will be on your bed upon arrival :)

100% of guests love my location- it is the best of both worlds: 5 minutes from the very center of downtown, yet quiet enough to not hear the noise at night. If you are still not convinced, please read my reviews.

The closest public transportation BLUE LINE is UIC HALSTED and is a 3 minute walk. It takes you to Willis Tower, Millenium Park and almost every other tourist destination in under 10 minutes!

access: Private entrance through front door. Private living room, dining room, bedroom and bathroom. No access to the kitchen. Coffee and tea service with hot water kettle provided.
description:
Idea for single travelers, business travelers, seniors, empty nesters. Lovingly restored Victorian era home. 9' ceilings, all hardwood floors, historic colors. Quiet family neighborhood. Very safe. Walk to Divy Bikes, Wriggly Field, corner pub, corner coffee joint, corner dry cleaner, brown line, corner laundry or sit on the front porch. When I traveled I did not like the chemical smell, indoor carpet or the inability for fresh air and natural finishes in chain hotels, hence this alternative.

You have access to first floor living room, dining room, bathroom and bedroom and front porch. This is a classic three story 2 flat. The buildings built during this era were all built by hand. They are peaceful, quiet and relaxing to stay in. Neighborhood is mainly single family and 2-flats, no high rises. You are still in the city and very close to all the attractions.

Private entrance through front door. Private living room, dining room, bedroom and bathroom. No access to the kitchen. Coffee and tea service with hot water kettle provided.

On site as required.

Family neighborhood, trees, quaint restaurants, coffee shops, ice cream. Can walk to everything. Friendly. Wriggly Field 1.1 miles East. Lakefront bike trail 1.9 miles East.

Brown line 5 minute walk away. Bus stop at the end of the street. Divy Bikes 2 blocks away. Uber always in about 3 mins.

Linens and towels washed with free and clear detergents. Mattress is Beautyrest Medium Firm Memory Foam mattress. Sheets are Egyptian cotton. Pillows are 2 down and 2 side sleeping neck supporting pillows.  Closet with hangers proved. Hardwood floors, oriental rugs and antique furniture so carefulness must be given to these items.

additional_house_rules:
- A passport or ID number and an address have to be provided upon confirming the booking as per building regulations. In case a guest does not provide the above, the check in will be cancelled
- Our Pet Policy outlines the weight limit and breed restrictions, along with related fees. Guests should notify us of any pets prior to check-in (failing to do so will incur a penalty)
- All occupants that plan to reside in the apartment may be subject to both a criminal and background check at any time. Participation is necessary to rent a property.
- Blueground has the right to enter and inspect the apartment or to show the apartment to a potential tenant any day of the week between 9am and 6pm as long as the tenant has been informed via email at least one day in advance
- Please contact us for details

description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this stylish Lakeview furnished studio apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and lovely living room with great high floor views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Chicago has to offer! (#CHI180)

As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this studio property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the Chicago vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this studio apartment include an on-site:
  
- Pet Friendly
- Gym
- Roof Deck

- Bike Storage
- Elevator

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.

Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

This furnished apartment is located in Lakeview, on the North Side of the city. From here, North Ravenswood Avenue is to the west and Lake Michigan is to the east. This area is important for medicine, as there are several hospitals and health centers. There’s no shortage of entertainment either. Lakeview is home to many theatres, live music venues and even Wrigley Field baseball stadium. Art and culture events take place regularly, such as the Lakeview East FestivaI and Chicago’s Gay Pride Parade. In addition to having many bus stops, Lakeview is served by six L stations of various lines, making it easy to access the rest of the city.

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
house_rules:
- A passport or ID number and an address have to be provided upon confirming the booking as per building regulations. In case a guest does not provide the above, the check in will be cancelled
- Our Pet Policy outlines the weight limit and breed restrictions, along with related fees. Guests should notify us of any pets prior to check-in (failing to do so will incur a penalty)
- All occupants that plan to reside in the apartment may be subject to both a criminal and background check at any time. Participation is necessary to rent a property.
- Blueground has the right to enter and inspect the apartment or to show the apartment to a potential tenant any day of the week between 9am and 6pm as long as the tenant has been informed via email at least one day in advance
- Please contact us for details

access: The whole mansion is yours to enjoy!
description:
Welcome to your Gold Coast MANSION unlike any other in the City. 

Our home is on one of the most famous streets in Chicago and is only steps from the subway to get you ANYWHERE in the City. It is the perfect adventure hub.

You and your group are in the heart of 3 of the best neighborhoods in Chicago - Old Town, Gold Coast, & River North, and steps from a major grocery store, pizza, the best restaurants, cigar lounge, everything!

This home books fast so we look forward to seeing you soon!

Welcome yourself to an Antique home located at the perfect cross-section of restaurants, grocery, convenience, and shops! 

Step inside and make yourselves home in your HUGE Gold Coast mansion with 5 spacious bedrooms and 5  bathrooms. When you enter, you can instantly notice the intricate woodwork of this antique home and the Chicago charm not easily found. 

Welcome yourself to a classic Chicago charm home, and explore all of the space your this mansion provides. 

The first floor  layout comes with a dining room with a dining table that can seat 6-8 to enjoy delicious meals, living room with comfy couches for lounging and family time, and a beautiful kitchen equipped with all your cooking needs. 

Walk up the stairs to the 2nd floor and unwind in our 3 bedrooms with lots of natural light and space for you. 

The 3rd floor has been remade into another spacious bedroom/living space where your group can lounge and enjoy TV or some great conversation.

Lastly, the space downstairs in the basement has yet another bedroom, washer/dryer, a desk, and another bathroom for all of your privacy needs.

You also have access to the back patio with great seating and even a BBQ grill ready for your group to cookout and have fun during a beautiful day in the city!

The whole mansion is yours to enjoy!

We are here to help you and nearby for any questions you may have!

You are on the edge of two of the best neighborhoods in Chicago: The Gold Coast and Old Town! You are just north of downtown Chicago, and nestled against the Lake Michigan shoreline. As the name would imply, the area is one of the country's most affluent neighborhoods. With streets that are lined with historic mansions and specialty boutiques, the Gold Coast is an intensely popular area for residents and visitors.

Branching off of The Magnificent Mile is Oak Street, an upscale shopper's dream. The retail revelry includes internationally recognized stores, swanky boutiques and rare, designer fashions. If carrying around loaded shopping bags makes you hungry, you can stop at one of the district's many celebrated restaurants, including Michelin-starred winners and classic Chicago steakhouses.

A day of shopping becomes a night of revelry on the neighborhood's fabled Rush Street. Amongst the prestigious hotels and celebrated eateries, you will find a trove of booming nightlife hot spots and high-energy events. Treat yourself to the Gold Coast, you deserve it!

We recommend walking since everything you would need is so close by! 

The Clark/Division Red line stop is right across the street! This gives you easy access to downtown Chicago in 10 minutes and the beach in 15 minutes! 

The highway is a short distance away if you are driving and an Uber is readily available for longer distances.

Worried about parking? Don't be! We have 1 parking spot in the back for you :). Fair warning: it is a tight squeeze.
